description: In SHOP SIMULATOR: PET SHOP you can fulfill your dream of running a pet store. Immerse yourself in the fascinating world of retail and keep your customers happy. You and up to three friends can customize your store and take care of all the needs of a pet store.

description:
Unleash the ultimate Need for Speed Unbound experience in one package with the Ultimate Collection. Enjoy instant access to all post-launch premium content, and the Vol. 9 Premium Speed Pass. Get access to 9 fully customizable cars, over 45 Customs, and 100+ additional cosmetics.

- Hip Hop Origin Swag Pack
- Vol. 4 Customs Pack
- Vol. 3 Catch-Up Pack
- Robojets Swag Pack
- Vol. 3 Customs Pack

name: Reach for the Stars
description:
The year is 3024.

While journeying home from a dangerous mission, a critical malfunction has crippled your rocket and stranded you on a strange planet several lightyears away from Earth.

Your only recourse is to use your grapple gun to travel to the orbiting planets and find a way harness their celestial energy. Only then will you be able to restore power to your ship and return home.

It seems he still needs more training, but maybe he’s already managed to create a perfect puzzle now and then...?

name: Carderia
description:
Rebuild and defend the fallen medieval town of Carderia where all is represented through cards. Stack your cards together and end your turn, to create buildings, mine ore, grow food and more!

But be careful to not run out of food throughout the nasty cold winters, live, survive and you may prosper during the verdant summers. Carderia is full of predictable and unpredictable events alike that spices up the gameplay in every run.

name: Outbreak: Shades of Horror Chromatic Split
description: Experience the beginning of the end of Cypress Ridge in this '90s survival horror nightmare at the dawn of the zombie outbreak.

name: Sainte-Vibrisse
description: A father and daughter set out for a peaceful camping holiday in the deep woods of rural Quebec. But when their car dies on a deserted road, their dream trip turns into a nightmare! No cell signal. No sign of life. Just an empty village, overrun with cats, strange happenings, and a supermarket that somehow… remains open despite no one inside. Are they truly alone? Or have they wandered into the heart of a dark and twisted cult? Sainte-Vibrisse awaits you… if you dare!

name: Hang Glider Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Halloween Memory Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Combine 2 Pumpkins
description: Combine 2 similar pumpkins into a new larger one! Use special pumpkins to achieve crazy combos and compete for the highest score!

name: Bubbleshot
description: You live in someone's immune system. Everyone is happy and go-lucky, until suddenly, a deadly disease attacks the town, and you have to save everyone.

name: Hazel & The Deep
description: A Doxy certified classic returns! This original web game is now remastered in a new engine, fully voiced and animated to shine through its sexy glory!

name: Her Deliverance
description:
A woman ventures to a church amid a storm to see if she can't get some help with some... eerie visions and feelings. Haunted by them, she seeks salvation in any way she can.

Is this really a curse? And if so... can she overcome it, in the end?

name: Jill O' Lantern
description:
A slasher satire visual novel where the Final Girl, Vivian Finala, teams up with the monster, Jack Headed Jill, to find out who really killed everyone on Lake Shish Kabob.

Make choices, investigate crime scenes, and meet a cast of queer and colorful characters!

name: UFO-Man
description: Control the UFO. Carry the Luggage. DON'T DROP IT. – A simple yet challenging foddian game for aliens.

name: Distressed
description: 5 Player Co-Op horror investigation game.

name: Sonic Generations
description: A time-traveling adventure featuring a greatest-hits collection of 3D and 2D Sonic stages, now with upgraded visuals and new bonus content.

name: TibiaScape
description: 2D MMORPG heavily inspired by classic tibia, with many innovations and improvements adding depth and longevity to it.

name: Shadow Generations
description: Play as Shadow in a brand-new story campaign featuring never-before-seen abilities that prove why he's known as the Ultimate Life Form! Speed through iconic stages from Shadow's history, discover hidden secrets in an expansive hub world, and unlock new powers to take on Black Doom and save the world.

name: Your Average Old School Shmup
description: An old school and simple shoot 'em up with an adaptative difficulty.

name: Shop Simulator: Pet Shop
description: In SHOP SIMULATOR: PET SHOP you can fulfill your dream of running a pet store. Immerse yourself in the fascinating world of retail and keep your customers happy. You and up to three friends can customize your store and take care of all the needs of a pet store.

name: Dark Blue Dungeon
description: Dark Blue Dungeon is an adventure game inspired by D&D-style role-playing games

name: Shop Simulator: Supermarket
description: DESIGN, SELL & EXPAND – YOUR SUCCESS IS IN YOUR HANDS. Put your entrepreneurial skills to the test in Shop Simulator: Supermarket. Immerse yourself in the world of retail and start your own business today!

name: Miraculous: Paris Under Siege - Deluxe Edition
description: Miraculous: Paris Under Siege - Deluxe Edition contains the base game, as well as an exclusive Digital Art Book, two new outfits, and two new visual effects for Ladybug and Cat Noir.

name: A Conversation With a Magical Deer
description: Have a conversation with a magical deer.

name: Roots of Harmony
description: Text-based 4X with a focus on turf war and resource management. Roots of Harmony is an old-school keyboard-controlled casual game where you have to lead your colony to different stages of development, while facing various threats and managing your doctrines and disciples.

name: Super Market
description: Super Market is a fun, silly game about shopping with superpowers, throwing items at friends, and racing to be the first to finish your shopping while the world around is gets crazier and crazier.

name: Cape Hideous
description: Amongst the motliest of all crews, an enigmatic woman prepares the ship to enter an intense thunderstorm that rages in the middle of the ocean. What otherworldly mysteries lie within?

name: Cursed Feed
description:
In first-person horror game "Cursed Feed," players embark on a chilling journey with the Thornvale family as they confront a malevolent force unleashed by their own patriarch's archaeological discoveries.

Richard Thornvale, a renowned archaeologist, returns from a harrowing expedition in the Middle East with cryptic artifacts in tow, he unwittingly invites an ancient curse into their tranquil home. Soon, inexplicable phenomena plague the household, and Emily, their young daughter, becomes the focal point of the sinister presence.

With each passing night, the family is tormented by terrifying apparitions and escalating paranormal activity, leading them to unravel dark secrets buried within the walls of their own home.

As they delve deeper into the mystery, they must confront their own fears and uncover the truth behind the curse before it consumes them all. Will they break free from the grip of the past, or will they become mere echoes in the haunted halls of their own history?

name: Circle
description:
"Circle" is a fast-paced, addictive arcade-style game designed to test your reflexes, precision, and strategic thinking as you navigate a deceptively simple yet increasingly intense circular arena. At first glance, "Circle" may seem straightforward, but the challenge quickly escalates, drawing you into a thrilling loop of action, suspense, and quick decision-making. The primary objective is clear: collect as many points as possible to achieve the highest score, all while dodging the ever-present and multiplying threats of black dots that are relentlessly poised to end your run.

In "Circle," you take control of a small, vividly colored sphere that glides smoothly around the perimeter of a circle, responding instantly to your commands. The arena's clean, minimalist design emphasizes fluidity and sharp focus, immersing you fully in the task at hand. Points, represented by glowing orbs, appear randomly within the circular arena, waiting to be collected by your agile sphere. Each successful collection adds to your score, pushing you further into the game’s escalating difficulty. What starts as a leisurely pursuit of points soon transforms into a frantic dash as the black dots, your primary antagonists, begin to multiply.

name: The Blackwood Legacy
description: A first-person puzzle horror game set in the eerie halls of Blackwood Manor. Solve intricate puzzles, unveil long-held secrets, and decipher the mystery surrounding your father's disappearance.

name: Treat-Seeking Tricksters
description: Explore the mysteries of a street which only appears after sundown on Halloween night! Get as much candy as possible by judging which houses have candy and avoid those which instead hide nasty tricks.

name: Move Out Manor
description: A grid-based action puzzle game set in a haunted mansion. Wander halls, find keys, and pack up items while avoiding spooky ghosts. Move out quick, or you may become a permanent resident.

name: Otherplane
description: Otherplane is a 1-4 player ghost horror escape room game

name: SCP: Mystery Man
description:
Dive into the enigmatic world of "SCP - The Mystery Man," an Alternate Reality Game (ARG) that blurs the lines between reality and fiction. In this immersive experience, you become the investigator, unraveling the secrets of the SCP Universe through a series of intricate puzzles and cryptic clues.

In "SCP - The Mystery Man," you will explore a rich narrative by decoding messages, solving riddles, and scouring the depths of the internet for hidden information. Clues are scattered throughout the game in various forms—text, images, and videos—all carefully designed to guide you deeper into the mystery.

Your mission is to track down the elusive Mystery Man, piece together fragments of evidence, and unveil the dark secrets that lie beneath. Use the in-game note-taking feature to keep track of your discoveries and insights, helping you connect the dots in this complex investigation.

Every clue brings you closer to the truth, challenging your wit and determination. Whether you’re interpreting a cryptic message, analyzing a suspicious image, or deciphering an obscure video, each piece of the puzzle is vital to your success.

Are you ready to immerse yourself in the shadowy depths of the SCP Universe and uncover the mysteries that await? Embark on your investigative journey with "SCP - The Mystery Man" and see if you have what it takes to solve the enigma.

name: Dreamless
description: In a remote provincial town, teenagers mysteriously disappear every 25 years. You're a high school student about to turn 18... But what if you become the next victim?

name: Color Swiper
description: In "Color Swiper", 30 tricky levels full of challenges await you, where you have to put your skills and strategy to the test. Use clever swiping movements to fill all the fields and solve exciting color puzzles. Sounds easy? Think again - every move counts!

name: Reaper's Odyssey
description: Sin descripción

name: Garbage Driver Truck Simulator 2025
description: Become the Ultimate Truck Driver: Conquer the City’s Cleanup

name: Arcade Room Simulator
description: STEP INTO THE PAST!

name: Psychopomp Gold
description: Psychopomp is BACK. The catacombs stretch down farther than ever before. Your entire life has been a lie. Delve into the depths, and discover the horrors that lie below. More realms, more modes, more secrets. An ancient voice calls to you from the center of the earth. Will you answer it?

name: CornField
description: CornField is a cooperative first-person horror game for 1-5 players. Collect all the necessary items and escape the cornfield! Run, scream, hide, but most importantly don't get caught! You will be chased by a scary monster that hears your voice from your mic and is definitely trying to kill you!

name: Super Mining Mechs
description: Build your own Super Mining Mech and explore the underground in search of new natural resources. Customize your mech with unlockable parts to dig deeper than ever - by yourself or with up to 7 friends in online co-op multiplayer! So, what are you waiting for? There’s mining to be done!

name: HappyHazard
description: A survival adventure game where players explore vast stages, solve puzzles, and find treasure while avoiding or battling enemies. Limited resources and inventory management require strategic play, offering tension and challenge without horror elements.

name: Jill O' Lantern: Final Cut
description: Find the clues to make a time bending turnabout in this off the rails visual novel about murder, mayhem, and a thicc pumpkin girl with a machete.

name: Mental Hellacious
description: The Most Difficult Action Climbing Game Hold to adjust jump distance simple controls. You'll likely fail countless times before mastering the jump. A single moment of error can ruin everything. Enjoy the experience the process of improving.

name: Babette
description: There's this old 90s virtual pet game at a yard sale. It's called 'Babette'. Now you can play with Babette the cat from the comfort of your bedroom. Just you and her! Keep Babette happy by playing with her, feeding her, and more! Except... Babette's more than just a cat. And she's coming for you.

name: Harukanaru Nirai Kanai
description: Sin descripción

name: Larut
description: A visual novel that retells the story of Nyai Roro Kidul.

name: 100 Hidden Kooky & Hiking Boots
description: Welcome to another kooky game series! Find 100 hidden silly characters with unusual behaviours on a BIG mountain scene & an additional 100 hidden hiking boots to complete the game. Also, play mini challenges to get help with your quest.

name: Franchise Hockey Manager 11
description: Franchise Hockey Manager returns for the 2024-25 season with plenty of additions to the deepest, most authentic hockey strategy gaming experience you can find. Choose from teams around the globe and select a team to guide to glory, including a chance at the ultimate prize, the Stanley Cup.

name: Path Builder
description:
Don't let your people fall down in the dark - build the path, so they can follow you to a better world.

Connect the path blocks and fill in the empty shapes to create a solid road for your friends. Try to do it in the best way possible to collect the stars. New levels will give you the new challenges. Solve all the puzzles to save all your followers!

name: Rogue Flight
description: Rogue Flight is a breathtaking arcade space combat game inspired by the landmark style of 80's and 90's prestige anime. Traverse the Sol system and join a flight force voiced by a veteran cast, featuring Japanese talent from Sailor Moon, Neon Genesis Evangelion, Gundam, Naruto & One Piece, and English voice talent featured in Overwatch and Fallout 76, League of Legends and Marvel's Avengers. Jump into true stylish arcade action with a huge host of spacecraft upgrades, game modes and multiple narrative paths.

name: Runny Bunny
description: Get ready for a fast and furry twist on puzzle action in side-scrolling pixel art platforming style!

name: Isekai Survivors
description: Isekai survivors is an Action roguelite with RPG elements and addictive gameplay loop, cute stylized art style and attractive heroines with unique playstyles to choose from. Collect items, complete quests, upgrade your stats and learn new powerful spells to dominate the battlefield.

name: Cats Hidden in Spooky Places
description: Cats Hidden in Spooky Places takes you on a spooky adventure! Explore 11 eerie scenes filled with witches, ghosts, and more. Find all 440 hidden cats and complete your collection!

name: Moe Waifu H: BlockBlast
description:
Meet 5 lovely female maidens and impress them with your brick breaking skills! Moe Waifu H - BlockBlast is a simple and addictive action puzzler where your goal is to clear the screen in old-school block breaking style. With each level you win, you’ll earn the hearts of your beautiful companions! There are 15 stages to master, each with multiple rounds of gradually increasing challenge.

Can you unlock all of their cute outfits and win them over?

name: Miraculous: Paris Under Siege
description: Embark on a thrilling adventure where heroism, acrobatic combat, and stunning parkour collide as Shadow Moth unleashes a wave of villains across the city. It’s up to Ladybug and Cat Noir to save the day!

name: Barbie Project Friendship
description: Get ready for the ultimate Barbie gaming adventure as Barbie and Barbie work together to save a beloved Malibu landmark, the Malibu Waves Community Center! Join them and their friends on a fun adventure to transform six spaces into fabulous spots like the Pet Salon, Campsite, Tech Lab, and more.

name: Warrior Architects
description: The game's story follows the grand adventures of warriors who encounter various villages and tribes. Collaborating with these tribes, they transform small villages into large fortresses, building defenses to repel external attacks. Their efforts earn the trust of the people.

name: Hot Springs
description: Immerse yourself in the warm waters and relaxing atmosphere of Japanese's Onsen

name: Nyaz
description: A dungeon crawler for cats that even beginners can play.

name: Playback Trauma: The Dog
description: Your dog Marla got lost in the most terrifying forest in New Jersey while on a walk, and now it's up to you to find her. Search the area, clean up Marla's poop, and avoid the creatures that may be lurking in the darkness.

name: Moon Ghost
description: 2199. Androids resolves the regrets of "ghosts", human souls, in the "Garden" lunar base.

name: Elder Legacy: Survival
description: Elder Legacy: Survival is a fun cooperative open-world survival game where you and your friends will find ways to defeat bosses and progress through biomes together.

name: Sample Gunpowder
description: Using a pretty familiar combination of gunpowder, you can create a variety of ammo and powders, this basic system will be responsible for keeping the water flow of a dam stable, allowing you to go to the next levels, and discover the challenges hidden here.

name: Peachy Derby
description: This is a casual racing game where the girl Natsuki is forced to join the "Ninja Racing Tournament" to pay off her debt. Include 10 playable girls, 100 dances, 600 Japanese voices, 16 story chapters, and outerwear destruction system.

name: VR Shogi Mates
description: Dive into the immersive world of board games with VRShogiMates! Play Shogi, Chu Shogi, Chess, Xiangqi, and Gungi in a virtual environment. Challenge friends in real-time or turn-based multiplayer. Learn the rules, while enjoying regular updates for an ever-evolving gaming experience.

name: Vox Populi: USA 2024
description: Play as an existing or fully customisable political figure, and campaign for many alternative US elections! In "Vox Populi: USA 2024", you and the characters around you must promote your ideas and your popularity throughout the country to claim victory!

name: Money and Lady
description: "Money & Lady" is a party game that requires luck & management strategy! Haa! This is also the gentlemen's favorite game, the game won the New Earth Best Happiness Award and Not Tired to Replay Award! Support up to 4 players, and 7 different heroines is waiting for you...

name: Rusts of Corruption
description: You've mysteriously awoken on an isolated island on an unknown world. A corrupting force spreads through the island, leaving only a short amount of time to learn about the islands mysteries... Who will you meet? What will you learn? Are you ready to see the world die?

name: Otome Sekai no Arukikata
description: Set in a near-future Japan after its society became completely dominated by women due to the rampancy of radical feminists and the country introducing the "Gender Segregation Act" decades ago, you are Katagiri Yui, originally a child soldier in the defense forces who eventually got to hid in a remote village under a fake identity, who is ordered by Mother, an social management AI, to attend the training school of the Security Force, a women's armed forces with your adoptive sister.

name: Hush Hush High
description: SHHH! Hold onto those secrets! Step into the mind of a gossip monger as she navigates through the corridors of her high school and help her resist the urge to share every tantalizing piece of gossip with quick time events.

name: Birds Adventure
description: Embark on an exciting journey with Flynn, a brave bird whose peaceful life is interrupted when his son is captured. Determined to retrieve him, Flynn plunges into a dangerous quest through stunning lands fraught with peril.

name: Throw Bro
description: Throw Bro is a Gameboy style 2D platformer where you throw things to solve problems and beat enemies!

name: Mound of Music
description: "Mound of Music" is a game dedicated to the art of MUSIC, presenting a captivating sci-fi story. Experience unique gameplay that lets you explore humanity's past through the universal language of music. Embrace beautiful classical music from around the world, fate and the truth are about to emerge.

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6
description:
Developed by Treyarch and Raven, Black Ops 6 is a spy action thriller set in the early 90s, a period of transition and upheaval in global politics, characterized by the end of the Cold War and the rise of the United States as a single superpower. With a mind-bending narrative, and unbound by the rules of engagement, this is signature Black Ops.

The Black Ops 6 Campaign provides dynamic moment-to-moment gameplay that includes a variety of play spaces with blockbuster set pieces and action-packed moments, high-stakes heists, and cloak-and-dagger spy activity.

In a best-in-class Multiplayer experience, players will test their skills across 16 new maps at launch, including 12 core 6v6 maps and 4 Strike maps that can be played 2v2 or 6v6.

Black Ops 6 also marks the epic return of Round-Based Zombies, the fan-favorite mode where players will take down hordes of the undead in two brand-new maps at launch. Post-launch, players can look forward to even more exciting maps and groundbreaking experiences dropping into both Multiplayer and Zombies.

name: Unfeigned Depths
description: Unfeigned Depths is a narrative focused first-person psychological thriller. Through the eyes of Adam, understand the true nature of your dreams with fully voiced dialogue and dynamic events. As the lines between trust and deception are blurred, can you uncover where reality ends and dreams begin?

name: Zector 7
description: Fight zombies with your friends in this survival open-world sci-fi. Harvest, Craft, Build, and purchase better gear and vehicles to survive the night. Explore and loot abandoned bases, crashed ships, caves, alien temples, and outposts to become the ultimate survivor.

name: Tetrachroma
description: Tetrachroma expands the tetromino stacking action of classic puzzle games with a new color changing mechanic inspired by Reversi. Stack blocks and change colors in a wide variety of modes.

name: Upstream Ante
description: A poker roguelike. Upstream Ante is a hypnotically satisfying card game based on Texas Hold'em where you place powerful bets, discover game-changing jokers, and choose fate cards to buff and debuff yourself as the game gets more intense for intense and adrenaline-pumping games.

name: Brotato: Abyssal Terrors
description: Brotato is a top-down arena shooter roguelite where you play a potato wielding up to 6 weapons at a time to fight off hordes of aliens. Choose from a variety of traits and items to create unique builds and survive until help arrives.

name: Breakthru
description: Imprisoned without a fair trial, it is up to Silas Nanashiel to escape together with the help of other inmates and save her elder sister Leila from receiving a fatal punishment.

name: Try to Wake Up : The Legend of Trevis
description: Legend has it that if you fall into a deep sleep while your body struggles to survive, Trevis will welcome your soul into his labyrinth. If you want to wake up, take a good look around and don't overlook any anomalies...

name: Super Blockbuster
description: Super Blockbuster is a retro action-puzzle game. Kick blocks to solve tricky puzzles and take on a diverse cast of enemies, all in gorgeous pixel art, inspired by the golden age of 2D puzzle games.

name: Interior Designer
description: Step into the world of Interior Designer. Embark on client jobs, dominate the Design League, and create stunning interiors. Shape your spaces, and unleash your style. Your masterpiece awaits.

name: Innsmouth 22
description: In this visual novel the main character, Lorenzo Righi, an Italian Professor, is invited to a meeting of History Scholars held in Boston. Excited and flattered by the invitation, he discovers that something else, hidden and mysterious, awaits for him.

name: Oversleep
description: Oversleep is a first-person puzzle adventure. Navigate dreamworlds, solve intricate puzzles, and employ unique mechanics to reveal secrets and overcome obstacles. Experience a mind-bending journey through bizarre environments.

name: The Coma 2B: Catacomb
description:
The Coma 2B: Catacomb is a Korean survival horror adventure. It is a back story of the previous game The Coma 2: Vicious Sisters, and a story bridge of all series. You are back in game as Youngho Choi, the main protagonist of The Coma 1, you must venture from the mirror dimension of reality to survive. What happened between The Coma 1 and The Coma 2? The answer is in here.

Immerse yourself in the warped Sehwa district as you encounter an engaging cast of characters, solve puzzles, discover revealing clues, and fight for survival against a relentless psycho.

Running and wielding your flashlight makes you an easy target. You must precariously balance the urgency of exploration with your absolute need to survive!

name: Gym Camp Simulator
description: A simulation game that challenges players to effectively manage gym camp. Create fitness programs, organize sports events, and provide healthy nutrition options to guide guests toward a healthier lifestyle.

name: Hypcampex
description: Hypcampex is a 2D-Platformer that embarks you on a remarkable adventure across Planet Photonus as the legendary Electrex Bolt, where he strives to acquire the Artifact of the Hypcampex and battle through the war against the malevolent Avengers of Light, the Lavengers.

name: The Apocalypse Sacrifice
description: The Apocalypse Sacrifice is a point and click adventure game with multiple endings. You take on the role of an adventurer who has lost his memory, with the only clue being a note found in his mouth. As you recover your memories, you uncover chilling secrets hidden within the town.

name: Paper Plane Arena: The Haunted House
description: Paper Plane Arena is an interactive game experience that is designed to ease your mind and have fun popping innocent balloons. You jump into the role of a little paper plane that is supposed to rescue the world from little but evil balloon demons by dashing through them.

name: Poroto
description: Poroto is a chaotic arcade adventure - blast red pegs in action-packed platforming! Jump and run across vibrant levels, strategically bouncing and shooting to eliminate all the red chaos. Pinball-style mechanics, bite-sized levels, and a pumping soundtrack make this an unforgettable experience.

name: Ys X: Nordics - Deluxe Edition
description: The Deluxe Edition of Ys X: Nordics includes the game, a digital soundtrack and a mini art book.

name: Snowpult
description: Frosty Cookie clicker with a mad dash of ice cold humour, hit the targets by slinging snowy balls of fury and hope the games narrator isn't awake to mock your failures.

name: Sonic X Shadow Generations
description: Shadow the Hedgehog is back with Classic and Modern Sonic in Sonic X Shadow Generations, an all-new collection featuring two unique experiences! Play as Shadow in a brand-new story campaign featuring never-before-seen abilities that prove why he's known as the Ultimate Life Form! Speed through iconic stages from Shadow's history, discover hidden secrets in an expansive hub world, and unlock new powers to take on Black Doom and save the world. Sonic X Shadow Generations also includes a complete remaster of the highly acclaimed Sonic Generations, a time-traveling adventure featuring a greatest-hits collection of 3D and 2D Sonic stages, now with upgraded visuals and new bonus content.

name: Sexbot
description: Can't find a date for the homecoming dance? Then order AmaZone's Alexa today! Our newest version of Alexa is a super sexy humanoid robot ready to follow your every command! *AmaZone is not responsible for Alexa AI sentience or robo-hostility, or global destruction

name: Devil Slot Machine
description: On a cursed slot machine, you engage in a deadly game of souls with the demons. Devil Slot Machine is a roguelike pigeon tower defense game. Purchase chips as defensive towers and release elemental bullets to destroy your enemies. Enjoy the exhilarating feeling of annihilating demons!

name: WildFront
description: WildFront is an immersive city building CCG adventure with rogue-lite AND souls-like elements. Venture deep into the wilds AND/OR compete against other players to bring prosperity back to your city. Build and upgrade your town to unlock permanent stat upgrades, cards, artifacts & more.

name: Bane Murrain
description: Dayne Muren, a nervous wreck of an engineer working on the K.R.E.V research station, is thrown into the midst of a biohazard bloodbath when a meteorite collision turns his crewmembers into mutated creatures.

name: Freja
description: Freja is a first-person psychological horror game with a unique approach. You take the role of a woman with PTSD and selective amnesia and must help her remember her past traumatic experiences through exploration and arcade games.

name: Finding Frankie
description: Finding Frankie invites you to participate in Frankie's terrifyingly twisted parkour game show. Stealthily navigate around horrifying characters, tackle obstacle courses, and swing and wall-jump through challenging parkour courses! This is a game show you wouldn't want to miss!

name: ThinkExplosive
description: ThinkExplosive is a first-person puzzle-platformer about bombs! Throw bombs to overcome obstacles - or launch yourself to new heights! Explore the corridors of an abandoned facility and discover new game mechanics.

name: Starship Scramble
description: Play an arena shooter roguelite where you build your own ship and survive through enemies' attack. You can even customize individual weapons, turning each one into a unique and formidable tool of destruction.

name: Surfing Legends
description: Surf the waves, rescue the wildlife, and collect the magic diamonds in this thrilling adventure! Buy faster boards and beat the clock to open new levels!

name: Connection: The Nightmare Within
description: Inspired by the classics such as Resident Evil, Silent Hill and Alone In the Dark: Detective Stone investigates a shadow group. Explore atmospheric levels, fight monsters, and solve puzzles. Unravel a story of twists and turns. Choose classic fixed camera, or over-the-shoulder.

name: FlipTiles: Warp Lines
description: A sci-fi arcade game. Flip tiles to change path ship move on.

name: Alnico Smithery
description: Alnico Smithery is a hand-drawn, physics-based forging simulator. Mine for ore, smelt ingots, discover alloys, forge tools, and rebuild the smithery your grandfather left behind.

name: Dragonium Adventure
description: Fight and make your way through the world of Akinori in this strategic turn-based RPG! Defeat powerful enemies, complete the intriguing story mode, upgrade your character, unlock new skills and join the fray in online multiplayer mode!

name: Mech Shuffle
description: Mech Shuffle is a roguelite deck builder where you choose a pilot and a mech to build a unique deck. Earn new cards and card upgrades to improve your deck over a run. Scout the battlefield, secure the beachhead, and repel the invasion!

name: Gorgon's quest
description: Gorgon's quest is a single screen action/platformer. Play alone or with a friend (local co-op) as the mythical gorgon sisters use your petrifying gaze to turn your enemies into stone. Explore ancient greek, find power ups and defeat great bosses.

name: Super Marxist Twins
description: A Parody Propaganda Platformer! Fight for The People through the challenging campaign and contribute to the Common Good by making your own levels and sharing them with your Comrades.

name: BeetleQuest 2
description: BeetleQuest 2 is a point & click adventure game about three beetlefriends who go on their second adventure to help the bumblebee postman. His letters and packages have come alive through a magic spell. The spell has gone wrong however, and all the letters and packages have run away.

name: Cryptid Farm
description: Cultivate a thriving farm to survive in this peaceful horror farming game! Play online with up to 16 players in the same lobby. Work together with your fellow farmers to repair your tractor and escape the farm, try not to fall victim to the eerie and mysterious creatures that lurk nearby.

name: Ooe
description:
A commemoration for the third anniversary of an actress’s death is being held on Ooe-jima, a remote island beyond Hachijou-jima, south of Tokyo. Osaki, a detective, receives a request to attend the ceremony on someone’s behalf.

While there, however, he is met with a strange series of events: the ship meant to bring them back fails to show up at the appointed hour, no one has heard a thing from the coordinator of the event, and there seems to be an inexplicable fear and hatred between all of the people in attendance.

Stranded on an ominous island that was once considered a place of exile, ten people try to unravel the mystery of their shared fate and the death of the actress “Ooe”…

name: Riot Operator
description: The Riot Police need great operators like you. Protect the peace in real places and manifestations. Your ability, perception, and skills will be tested. Control the Uncontrollable!

name: King's Orders
description: King's Orders is a simplified historical strategy game with an important innovation. You command thy armies by sending letters with orders. Messengers with letters travel the land and can be lost or intercepted. Generals execute orders once received and send you reports the same dangerous way.

name: Fun Pack Series Edition
description: Come and have fun with this incredible package with two super fun games.

name: Halloween Hidden Object Bundle
description: Immerse yourself in the mysterious world of Halloween with our exclusive hidden object bundle, which includes three captivating games: Ominous Tales: Forsaken Isle, Witch's Pranks: Frogs Fortune and Dracula's Legacy.

name: Straftat: Weapons, Maps and Hats
description:
The DLC "Weapons, Maps and Hats" contains :

- 70+ maps (totaling 140+ with the base game)

- 10 exclusive guns

- many new hats

Unlocked DLC content will be available for both players in owner's lobby.

Find the new guns on the DLC exclusive maps.

New cosmetic hats are unlocked immediately upon purchase.

name: Trainz 2019: BR Class 24 - Blue & Green
description: The British Rail Class 24, also known as the Sulzer Type 2, was a class of diesel locomotives that operated on the British Rail network. A total of 151 units were produced. They had a maximum speed of 75mph, and a power output of 1160 hp, and were nicknamed 'rats' due to their abundance.

name: Distant Worlds 2: Return of the Shakturi
description: An ancient evil is returning to the vast universe of Distant Worlds 2. The Return of the Shakturi is the third expansion and first feature expansion for the acclaimed 4X space strategy game, Distant Worlds 2. It adds a full endgame crisis and story, along with numerous new gameplay features and improvements that elevate the experience to new heights.

name: Banners of Ruin: Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: RPG Alchemy: Bestiary I
description: Sin descripción

name: Pinball FX: Camp Bloodbrook
description: Sin descripción

name: Gundam Breaker 4: Story Mission DLC 1 - Go! Restart!!
description: Sin descripción

name: Dicefolk: Will Chimeras Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Banners of Ruin: DLC Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Gundam Breaker 4: Diorama Pack 1 - Colony Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Anime Girls: Busty Baseball
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Shin-chan: Bundle
description: Shin-chan: "Me and the Professor on Summer Vacation -The Endless Seven-Day Journey-" and Shin-chan: "Shiro and the Coal Town" bundle set.

name: Nightmare Flight
description: Nightmare Flight is a horror game that takes place in an airplane. Survive through three different horror scenarios, while trying to fly an airplane without a co-pilot. You must check on the passengers, and noises from the plane, but do not leave the cockpit for too long. The Undead, Aliens, and different creatures have boarded the plane. They will try to grab, attack, and drag you to your death. Fly the plane, while fighting off these monsters to survive the flight.

name: Dizzy Hero
description: Transform into a hero with your wobbly moves in this unique action game!

name: Car Parking Legends: Drive & Park Adventure
description: The art of parking.

name: Unpacking Universe Dreams
description: Unpack, Arrange, Create - Shape your world

name: Enchantress of the Sea
description: Enchantress of the Sea is a 4-map themed miniwad for Boom with a water temple aesthetic style. The gameplay is varied, as it combines linear, sandbox and fight-oriented maps.

name: Kaidan of Rules: Shengya Community
description: Sin descripción

name: Finding America: The Great Lakes - Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Mechanic Supermarket 2024
description: Master the art of running a supermarket and tuning cars!

name: The Booze of Monkey Island
description: Sin descripción

name: Pinball M: Camp Bloodbrook
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Archives: Metamorphic Force
description:
"METAMORPHIC FORCE" is an action game released by KONAMI in 1993.
Four young heroes arise as heirs to the goddess and divine beasts that once fought the dark lord to end his evil reign.
Transform into a beast and use your powers in battle. Unleash your wild side and destroy the enemy forces!

name: Eldritch Soul
description: A roguelike deckbuilder about hiding from an unknowable being, called The Hunter. The Hunter aims to destroy anyone with knowledge from the Eldritch Tome, so you must use this knowledge to hide it. Learn the secrets of the universe in the form of cards, then use these cards to banish these secrets from your mind when the hunter approaches.

name: Juxtagram
description: A logic puzzle game about building pictures out of squares. Using the clues on the side of the grid, you'll need to fill in the puzzle with dark and light squares to reveal the picture hidden within.

name: PowerWash Simulator: Halloween Seasonal 2024
description: Something filthy this way comes in PowerWash Simulator’s latest Seasonal Special. You’ll have to hose off more than a few cobwebs to take the Halloween House from mortifyingly mucky to party-ready perfection.

name: Rise of the Half Moon
description: Play a card game against the moon and test your knowledge of the lunar cycle.

name: Kindred
description: In this eerie, horror visual novel, you are confined in a room with a monster. How will you fare against petrifying odds? Will you be able to work your way into the mind of an indecipherable beast, or will you be added to the casualty count? A word of advice: Choose a side; don't look back.

name: Pix'Hard
description: "Fight off endless hordes of enemies with your ship! Upgrade it to defeat increasingly powerful opponents! Choose your upgrades carefully, manage your priorities, and find your enemies' weak points!"

name: Chaos Entropy
description: This RPG features a unique combat system! After obtaining the Chaos God's Ring, you must evade the Goddess's minions while exploring the world, collecting divine weapons, and awakening heroic spirits. Assemble a knightly order to battle powerful enemies and uncover the ancient secrets of Eusayard.

name: CatClimber
description: Adventurous 2D platformer, Smash bricks and climb up the floors of the dungeon to find the treasures of the dragon

name: The Parish
description: A slow and atmospheric retro horror game. These hills hide more than just this congregation. Tend this remote church, give services to the needy and you never know... you might just survive the night

name: PlayGuys
description: Choose your skills, combine your equipment, match them with unexpected combinations and enjoy the joy of mowing grass. playgus is a survival-like game. Players will be free to take risks in a relaxed and pleasant style.

name: Mother's Home
description: Mother's Home is a psychological horror game. The player is left alone at home while their mother is taken to the hospital. Sarah soon finds out she is not alone, and her mother is back inside the house.

name: Escaping Darkness
description: Find your way out of an abandoned mansion, avoiding an evil entity set on hunting you as you escape through pitch black rooms. Scavenge for resources to keep the dark at bay and solve puzzles to move forward. Escaping Darkness is an escape room-based survival horror game designed for VR.

name: The Dark Mind
description: Locked in Jessica's endless hallucinations. Carefully observe your surroundings to guide her back to reality. An Unreal Engine 5 short horror hidden object game.

name: Coffee Extra: Ukuzala
description: A mysterious board game that magically turns its players pregnant. Navigate through a spooky house and solve puzzles in order to beat the game and help the heroines escape unscathed.

name: Kung Pao Banqi
description: Kung Pao Banqi is a two-player game of chance played on half a xiangqi board. Play hot seat, against AI, or online and beat your opponents with luck and strategy!

name: Ninja Wars: Battle Simulator
description: Unleash your strategic skills in Ninja Wars: Battle Simulator! Command your army of Swordsmen, Spearmen, and Archers in a stunning 3D world. Analyze enemy formations and develop tactics to lead your ninjas to victory.

name: MatchOolu
description: A card matching game like no other. Test your memory. Test your dexterity. Explore your mind.

name: From Hell
description: From Hell is a first-person psychological horror game that focuses on creating fear and tension for the player.

name: A Story About Birds
description: The birds are coming back! So, gather some wood, some bird food, and build some amazing shelters. Explore Plumage Farm on a relaxing day and get to know its inhabitants and regulars. How will you use the day?

name: Harvest Master
description: A farm puzzle game that makes you want to repeat it over and over again to achieve a high score!

name: Motion Soccer
description: Motion Soccer immerses you in 11v11 matches that you'll experience in a whole new way thanks to Virtual Reality: control the game from an aerial view, play in first person with classic controls, or use real movement to control the player's feet. Get ready to dominate the field!

name: Conflux
description: A horror game where you can interact with your surroundings to find clues, fight monsters and solve puzzles as you uncover new areas in search for a mysterious artifact.

name: Endless Empty
description: Sci-fi horror about a controversial company that removes the world's trash.

name: Easy Cute Clean Up Lesson
description: Let's put the scattered items back where they belong! Practice tidying up with a fun game, and soon you'll be able to tidy up your own room too!

name: House of Horror: 7 Psychos
description: Face seven deadly psychopaths, each guarding a terrifying floor. Solve puzzles, avoid traps, and exploit their weaknesses to escape the nightmare.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Chrotopia
description:
A world where only black and white exist.
“Chro”searches for his sister in various places.

name: Bookshop Wonderland: Supermarket Simulator
description: Bookshop Wonderland: Supermarket Simulator – Where Every Aisle Tells a Story!

name: Eggconsole Murder Club PC-8801
description: Detective J.B. Harold rushes to solve a mysterious murder case that occurred in the outskirts of Liberty Town.Uncover the truth of the case!

name: Bloody Rune
description: Turn-based single-stroke drawing roguelike deck-building game. Draw and use various runes to defeat all enemies and win the Rune War.

name: Walkabout Mini Golf: 8-Bit Lair
description: Traverse a wicked corporate skyscraper, global headquarters of Vincent Vector, hacker billionaire and spoiled genius. Will you be able to stop his bogus plot to shred the physical world and bring it all into his vast Virtual Reality? Find out in this radical '80s mini golf adventure.

name: Nonogram Halloween
description: Use your logic to paint beautiful images in this relaxing puzzle. The gorgeous visuals and relaxing soundtrack will help you forget all your problems and have a great time!

name: Doodle Hunt: Halloween Rush
description: Doodle Hunt: Halloween Rush is a thrilling seek-and-find game set in haunted, hand-drawn Halloween scenes. Explore eerie maps, uncover hidden spooky items, and bring them to life with glowing color! A magical Halloween adventure for all ages.

name: Paragnosia
description: Observe every corner of your apartment by moving your camera along a rail that runs through the rooms. Find and take pictures of paranormal anomalies to exorcise them. Locked in your surveillance room, will you survive tonight's 8 rounds?

name: Hydroponics Farm & Store Simulator
description: Transform your passion into profit with Hydroponics Farm & Store Simulator! Design, build, and manage your own sustainable hydroponics system. Experiment with different plants and fish, customize your setup, and harvest your success. Dive into the future of farming today!

name: Fun Pack
description: Fun Pack is a package with two games that are guaranteed to be fun.

name: Arcade Tanks World II: Tank Battle Simulator
description: The arcade world of battle tanks is in danger again! Get into the tank, go to the battlefield and complete all combat missions!

name: Medieval Grandmaster: Tavern Board Battle
description: Chess is a popular board game for those who like to think in a medieval style! Awaken your strategic thinking and become a real chess king!

name: Prisnhax
description: Hack into 50 prison cells with light-based digital puzzle locks.

name: The Cheese Chase: Pizza Madness
description: Become the best pizza delivery guy in town!

name: Terror In The Corn
description: In an endless cornfield where the sun never rises, you must break the curse or risk being trapped forever.

name: Carry The Glass
description:
Team up as two quirky construction workers in this fun 2-player co-op platformer!
Carry a fragile glass window through colorful levels filled with challenges.
Communicate and coordinate to dodge obstacles and solve puzzles.
Can you finish the job without breaking the glass?

name: Party on Hallow Grove
description: Talk to kooky guests, trade party items, and explore Death’s mansion as you throw him the spookiest birthday party ever.

name: Portrait of a Torn
description: As a young soldier returning to an eerily deserted home, you'll explore enigmatic rooms, solve intricate puzzles, and uncover a haunting, tragic story.

name: Motocross Ramp Madness
description: Sin descripción

name: The Jackbox Survey Scramble
description: Discover how people across the country think! The Jackbox Survey Scramble is a collection of hilarious survey-based party games, using real one-word answers from real people. Really! Grab some friends and start guessing!

name: Anime Puzzle Quest: Complete DLC Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Romance of The Three Kingdoms 8 Remake: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Gravity Drop
description: Take it to the skies in a physics-based puzzle platformer, where you'll navigate through two dozen of levels, overcoming challenges to deliver packages to their destinations. Master your flying skills and conquer the gravity!

name: Cursed Ones
description:
Cursed Ones is a 1-2 player co-op horror survival game.
Play as the Crane siblings as you continue your late parents' legacy to purge the world of sinister spirits.
Track down the items used to summon the spirit by any means necessary.

Make sure you both don't die in the process.

name: Unfair Rampage: Knightfall
description: Fast-paced 2.5D platformer! Blast through a destructible medieval world. You've been sent back in time to correct a twisted space-time continuum - battle knights and archers, dodge hazards, carve your path, and race against the crumbling world behind you. Easy to learn - hard to master!

name: Heavy Hand: Pixel Tree Forest Fury - Deluxe Edition
description:
Team up for a pixel-packed adventure in Heavy Hand: Pixel Tree Forest Fury Deluxe Edition—where every swing and strategy counts for two. Unleash the ultimate pixelated adventure with the Deluxe Edition of Heavy Hand: Pixel Tree Forest Fury!

This enhanced version takes your gameplay to new heights with two exciting DLC packs:

Heavy Hand: Coin Collector’s Bounty – Boost your treasure trove with an extra 1500 coins, giving you the edge to upgrade your gear and unlock special features faster than ever.

name: Orebound
description: Journey on a quest to find the Emberstone. Lost in the depths of time. The king has tasked you to find it buried in the mountains. Dig deep and automate mining in the mountains before you. Craft, discover runes, send precious metals and gems back to your kingdom. Grow, mine and find the Emberstone.

name: Some Some Convenience Store: Yena After Story
description: Sin descripción

name: Botworld Odyssey
description: Venture out into a huge and diverse open world to discover new bots, collect rare scrap to build them, and deploy them in tactical real-time battles on your quest to become the world’s greatest Botmaster.

name: Uraankhians Dygyn: The Beginning
description: URAANHAI! Finally, we have all together driven Alaa-Mogus into the underworld! Now let's have a real Ysyakh and celebrate! Let's organize the first "DYGYNA" game and find out who is the fastest! Play in multiplayer and become the FIRST!

name: Vendetta Forever
description:
WELCOME TO CULT ACTION PARADISE

VENDETTA FOREVER fuses rapid-fire tactical gunplay with effortless acrobatic style in an unapologetic love letter to classic action cinema.

We take everything you love about top-tier VR action, remove the fluff and cut to the good part for 100% gunplay purity.

name: Tower of Nod
description:
Tower of Nod is an action-roguelike deckbuilding platformer with unique sleep-based controls. You are a Hero that can masterfully manipulate the falling Blocks and build a path upwards... but only while you're asleep! Move quickly and confidently to avoid the blocks above and lava below.

Build a deck of pieces at your disposal to aid your journey upwards and grant you temporary boosts. Pair them with powerful relics to create unique synergies. Climb higher and higher while managing your sleeping state to stay out of danger!

name: Labyrinth of Lust
description: Part man, part bull, and horny for raw, uninhibited sex. Rumors about sexual insanity in Minotaur's labyrinth were traveling all across the kingdom... Chained, whipped, and fucked, the blonde from the North and the dark girl of far South pleasure their new master in ways no mortal man could imagine.

name: Florist Business Simulator
description: Bring flowers from nature to venues in Florist Business Simulator. Develop your business by gathering flowers, making stunning arrangements, and decorating venues to delight your customers with beautiful spaces.

name: Crowded. Followed.
description: You have the briefcase. Now it's after you. It's not going to stop. Be careful—it may take the form of someone else. A short horror game by NIGHT DIAL.

name: Kebab Simulator VR
description: Get ready for a whirlwind of culinary chaos in Kebab Simulator VR! The first, best and only VR Kebab Simulator of the world! Serve up German fast food favorites like doner kebabs, pizza, burgers, and fries. It's a short-lived, single-player rush of frantic fun that'll leave you hungry for more!

name: Until Oblivion
description: Until Oblivion is an atmospheric narrative game that follows 17 year old nobody Emma Wilson as she tries to rekindle a dying relationship in a dying world. Join her in an increasingly nightmarish Halloween party and find out if anything (or anyone) is worth anything at all.

name: Wizard of Wings
description: A puzzle-adventure escape game. Solve clever puzzles set within stunning 3D graphics, exploring well-crafted environments to uncover hidden clues and useful objects. Experience the thrill of freeing the birds and advancing through this mesmerizing journey.

name: Monster Jam Showdown: The Odd Couple
description: Sin descripción

name: Monster Jam Showdown: Law & Disorder
description: Sin descripción

name: Romancing SaGa 2: Revenge of the Seven
description:
Romancing SaGa 2: Revenge of the Seven is a full remake of the groundbreaking non-linear RPG Romancing SaGa 2, which originally launched in Japan in 1993.

Embark on an adventure featuring both new and classic SaGa franchise features, complete with Japanese and English voiceovers, original and rearranged compositions, and much more! This is an ideal entry point for new players and provides an amped-up experience for longtime fans.

name: Where wh..?
description: "Where wh..?" ("何处") is a point and click puzzle game based on Lowpoly art style, you need to find the different and hidden resources in the screen, travel through nine worlds, explore the unknown areas, various gameplay, melodious music, suitable for all people to get started easily.

name: DragonMirrored with Hyoga & Magma
description: The two dragons, the main characters, move symmetrically during the puzzle as if they are mirror images of each other. Over 300 puzzles appear in the game. As the game progresses, various gimmicks appear one after another.

name: Slay the Princess: The Pristine Cut
description:
Slay the Princess is a choice-driven psychological horror visual novel with dramatic branching, light RPG elements, and hand-penciled art.

The Pristine Cut is the definitive version of the game. It features expanded content including 3 new chapters, never-before-seen Princesses, expansions to familiar routes, a new ending, over 1,200 new hand-penciled frames, over 2,500 new lines of dialogue, and over 35% more content overall.

name: Escape Tales: The Awakening
description: “Escape Tales: The Awakening” is a haunting narrative puzzle game that plunges you into a world shrouded in darkness and mystery. Immerse yourself in a gripping tale of loss, redemption, and the echoes of a forgotten past based on the well-received escape room card game.

name: Chillax
description: Play mini games while enjoying the sight of sea creatures.

name: Echoes Ⅱ
description: Sin descripción

name: Care Bears: To The Rescue
description: Care Bears: To The Rescue is a platformer game set in the Care Bears universe featuring 30 levels across five unique worlds! Experience the game in singleplayer mode or up to 4 players in local co-op mode!

name: Mercapolis
description: Build and manage your own supermarket. Place orders for seasonal products, stock them on the shelves, and get ready to survive a workday full of surprises. Hire employees and keep your customers happy in Mercapolis.

name: Soul Interface
description: This game is a virtual aquarium \ petri dish. Grow \ design virtual lifeforms, experiment, watch them compete for survival in a shared environment, spread them across space to other singleplayer worlds....<3

name: Asha Empire: Exodus
description: Asha Empire: Exodus is an exhilarating action shooter set in the expansive Asha Galaxy. Experience the intense final hours before the fall of Sirina, a critical imperial industrial military base, as Commander Rexis or Commander Kyra. Your mission is to infiltrate the enemy-occupied base, retrieve vital information, and escape before the Empire commences bombardment from space.

name: Professor Doctor Jetpack
description: Professor Doctor Jetpack is a physics based lunar lander game, in which you embark on a dangerous journey to ... control your jetpack. Also to save the world, of course.

name: The Smurfs: Dreams
description: It is a 3D platform game with puzzle elements and solo or cooperative gameplay. There are 12 levels in total and another 16 mini-levels. Players can customize their Smurfs with special magical orbs and tokens taken from bosses.

name: Drak(c)ula
description: Drak(c)ula is a typing game where you type the horror novel Dracula by Bram Stoker.

name: The Last Farmer
description: "The Last Farmer" is not just a tale of survival; it's a journey of restoration. Amidst the sprawling deserts of a forgotten Texas, your farm becomes a symbol of hope and persistence.

name: Archipelago: Island Survival
description: Survival simulator on an archipelago of islands. Sandbox with a huge open world. Over 300 different items and resources, over 100 different enemies and NPCs. Elements of trade and RPG.

name: Project Legion
description: Immerse yourself in terrifying dreams and unravel mysteries playing alone or with friends. Confront supernatural horrors, survive terrifying enemies, and complete various missions to solve the cases.

name: Dot & Dot Dungeons
description: Adventure in dungeons that change every time you enter! The equipment you get in the dungeon is randomly selected to determine its strength! What will you see at the end of your adventure?

name: Polygon In
description: A game where you can survive, fight zombies and bandits, and do it all with a friend!

name: Voxel Hunters
description: Fight, die, repeat! Voxel Hunters is a 1-4 player co-op, top-down roguelite shooter. Team up to blast and defend through a sprawling alien solar system. Upgrade, strategize, and face endless challenges in an epic fight for survival!

name: You Left Us
description: Crowned the victor of Pirate Software Game Jam 14, You Left Us promises a heart-pounding journey through the depths of psychological horror. Stranded in the desolate snowfields of Greenland, your survival hinges on the fragile lifeline of your listening post.

name: Card-en-Ciel
description: Card-en-Ciel is a deckbuilding, roguelite RPG adventure featuring over 300 characters and 50 vocal songs. Earn a chance to recruit a new ally with each victory, opening up new strategies and combos.

name: Dollmare
description: You've accepted a shady job offer at a doll factory. Inspect dolls for defects and anomalies. Follow strange protocols. Don't get fired and stay alive.

name: My Protogen Engineer
description: You've almost died, you lost your body. Gladly, you were saved by your old friend Xena, a genius engineer who lives on a desolate planet. Now it's time to recover and find a new goal in your life!

name: Puppet House
description: A disturbing horror game set in the abandoned house of a deceased ventriloquist. Take on the role of Rick and unravel the mystery of the mansion, be careful because you won't be alone. Do you dare to cross the threshold to discover the truth?

name: Voidwrought
description: Voidwrought is a 2D action-platformer set in a hand-drawn world of cosmic horrors. Explore the thawing ruins of the First Civilisation and strike down the gods that dwell there. Grow your powers, uncover ancient Artifacts, and expand your shrine amid the wreckage.

name: Hunky City
description: You move to a new city to live with your "former" stepfather. Work, make friends, and explore the thrilling world of romance in this captivating game. Are you ready for the excitement? Let the journey begin!

name: My Confounding Cat is Criminally Cute!
description: A cute, wholesome yaoi / boys love visual novel about a grumpy wizard and... a black cat? Wait, what?

name: Stickin' the Landing
description: Stickin’ the Landing is a relaxing puzzle game where you pilot a spaceship around outlandish galaxies, using stickers and their gravitational properties to reach your destination. Embark on an odyssey through the home’s nooks and crannies, and discover everything this marvelous world has to offer!

name: Windblown
description: Brave the Vortex and dash your way to greatness in this lightning-fast action roguelike from the creators of Dead Cells. Alone or in coop, become the ultimate killing machine as you enhance your skills and master your weapons in search of that perfect run.

name: Some Goodbyes We Made
description: I have some memories of saying goodbye that I don't want to forget, so I turned them into 11 minigames and backed them up in this collection.

name: Movies Tycoon
description: Movies Tycoon is a tycoon simulation game where you dive into the world of film-making. Start with a humble studio, scout and manage top talent, customize unique characters, and direct blockbuster films.

name: Rubicon: Cubindom
description: Rubicon is a turn-based puzzle game based on the principle of the Rubik's Cube. Use the game mechanics that the world has loved and our innovations to restore order to the inhabitants of Cubindom.

name: This Magical Girl is a B*tch
description:
Join Tabitha Bones in act 1 of a lighthearted romp through the world's most dysfunctional school!

It's Halloween Spirit Week, and even grumpy Tabbie is ready for some fun. But when her nemesis, Eden (the worst kind of 8th grade boy), steals her thunder, everything goes horribly wrong.

Luckily for her, a magical pixie gives her the power to grab fate and whack the sh*t out of anyone in her way!

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms 8 Remake
description: Theater of war, infinite drama. A masterpiece of historical simulation, "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS 8" is revived after 20 years! Enjoy the greatest military drama in the series, with the largest number of officers and scenarios, including an improved "All Officers Play" feature.

name: Telebbit
description: No future for mankind. Now, rabbits rule the world. A fast-paced platform game using teleporters.

name: Entities
description: Dive into horror in Entities. Solo or up to 4-player matches offer dynamic puzzles and relentless entities hunting you. Investigate, unlock paths, and survive in lawless zones as a private operator. Tools, teamwork, and terror await. Uncover chilling truths.

name: Improbability Control Bureau
description: Immerse yourself in a chilling, X-Files-inspired horror game where you monitor live surveillance cameras, spotting and addressing anomalies. From eerie furniture shifts to unexpected intrusions, report anomalies to correct them and survive the night using your keen eyes and memory. Trust no1.

name: Long Story Short
description: Long Story Short is a funny and erotic adult game about a young man who finally decides to explore life beyond his computer screen. Follow him as he retells his experiences to a mysterious girl. Choose what kind of sexual person he will become. A new world of sexual debauchery awaits you.

name: The Last Man Survivor
description: The Last Man Survivor is a gloomy roguelike in which you have to fight tons of enemies, slay giant bosses, discover new abilities and characters, and also find out the dark secret of the Last Survivor

name: Hellwatch
description: Join a squad of 4 suicidal to protect the celestial artifact from demon invasion in online cooperative roguelite. Reveal yourself in a munchkin way: support your team or drain their power. Struggle your way to better gear and beware debuffs from death. Kill, die, defeat, repeat!

name: EWorlds
description: Get ready for an intergalactic adventure in eWorlds! After a crash, you’re stuck on a tropical island. Grab the Loops to unlock the Space HUB, which will open up exciting worlds. Solve puzzles, dodge traps, and uncover mysteries, solo or with friends. Are you up for the legendary Golden Loop quest?

name: Straftat
description: 1v1 Online Medium paced FPS with somewhat retro graphics from the early 2000' era.

name: Dark Hours
description: Dark Hours is a co-op survival horror game for 1-4 players. Your heist has been disrupted by a supernatural event, and your team of robbers is now trapped with an evil entity. Forget your plan, your mission is to survive. Explore and cooperate to find a way out or hide and pray for daylight.

name: Clutter RefleXIVe: The Diceman Cometh - Collector's Edition
description: By far, the most challenging and exciting Clutter ever. You will not believe the Dice, Flat-Pastel-Icons & the Abstractica Object Sets. And 3 Quests - Regular, Super-Difficult The Diceman Cometh Quest, and Super-Easy Oldschool Quest.

name: The Dead Await
description: Build your deck and try to survive in The Dead Await, a deck-building RPG set during a zombie apocalypse. As one of many survivors, set out across the desolate world, discover the truth about the outbreak, and rebuild human civilization - or die trying.

name: Forgive Me Father 2
description: Embark on a journey into the darkest nightmares to restore your sanity. Blast your way through hordes of possessed enemies, unlock an arsenal of deadly weapons and get ready to face even more Lovecraftian madness in this action-packed FPS sequel.

name: Last Stance: A JuVentures Game
description: Fight your way through endless waves of enemies in this fast paced 3-button punch game.

name: Vasilisa and Baba Yaga
description: An adventure game based on the Russian folktale "Vasilisa the Beautiful". A scary story about the journey to the mistress of the forbidden forest for magical powers.

name: Soul Stalker
description: The survivor roguelike where you slay your psyche. Take down waves of enemies in the natural evolution of the genre established by Vampire Survivors, with visuals inspired by Paper Mario.

name: Band Space
description: Band Space is a co-op VR rhythm game for one to four players.Standing on various stages with lighting show, playing drum set, keyboard, bass or guitar, your band will become rock star!

name: Heavens' Revolution: A Lion Among the Cypress
description: Revolution consumes a Persian dieselpunk city! Will you let it consume you, too? Make a name for yourself as a powerful astralchemist and resist the usurpers…or join them!

name: Polygon of Reality
description: Being in complete darkness, a person involuntarily comprehends the thought of whether he is alone in it? Penetrate into another dimension with your secrets and meanings, monsters and monsters. After passing here please don't stop otherwise you will stay here forever

name: The World of Kungfu: Dragon and Eagle
description: A nostalgic pixel RPG that tells a Wuxia fantasy set in ancient China. You will start as a no-name wayfarer in a world of Kungfu, acquaint yourself with journeymen from feuding clans and sects, learn different schools of martial arts, and eventually make your own name at the crossroads of times.

name: Coven
description: Coven is a retro fps/slasher set in the 1600's in which you play as a young woman who is wrongly accused of witchcraft and burned at the stake. She's resurrected by an unknown force and seeks revenge.

name: Prim
description: Play as Death's Daughter in this hand-drawn, black-and-white 2D point-and-click adventure game with art inspired by the animated films of Tim Burton!

name: Orange Season
description: Orange Season is a farm-life RPG, focused on exploration and different gameplay mechanics.

name: Fae Farm: Skies of Azoria
description: The winged denizens of Skyvale need your help, they've sent you an invitation to visit their mysterious land in the clouds: their patron Sprite, Gusto, has turned unusually moody and it looks like you might be the one to solve this mystery.

name: Spaceship Typing
description: An educational typing game to help kids learn how to use a keyboard.

name: Crypt's Game
description: You are out in the woods, in search of the entity known as Crypt. Stopping in your tracks, you see it approaching. You take aim with your shotgun, intending to kill it, when suddenly the ground beneath you gives way, dropping you down into the earth. You find yourself trapped in Crypts dungeon where it will play a twisted game of Cat and Mouse. Killing it is the only way out, will you survive?

name: VR Catgirl Isle 2100
description: This is a fascinating VR leisure game, a game with giant catwoman is about to begin.

name: I Didn't Cheat
description:
Hello, Students of Redstone Middle School!
School exams are just around the corner, so start studying to prepare for your graduation.

Remember the rules : no cheating, no phones, no noise during the exam, and focus on your exam sheet.

You're sitting in a school exam, completely lost when it comes to the questions. Your only way out? Cheating with your phone! Just make sure your tough teacher doesn’t catch you in the act!

You will go through 4 days with different guards. Make sure to wear Headphones for a thrilling experience.

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Hammer
description: Sin descripción

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Nichole's Home Brew
description: Sin descripción

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Good Times with Weapons Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: So I'm a Spider, So What? Ruler of the Labyrinth
description: I was just an ordinary high school girl, but suddenly I was reincarnated as a spider monster. Armed with only my human knowledge and my overwhelming positivity, I'm forced to use spiderwebs and traps to defeat far stronger monsters just to stay alive in a clicker game...

name: Catch Beshi!! Scooping Game
description: Beshi the frog, a famous character by Fujio Akatsuka, the king of Japanese gag manga of the Showa era, has been made into a game.

name: Euro Truck Sim Driver Simulator 24: Garbage
description: Sin descripción

name: Flippets
description:
In a distant land, concealed within the mystical forests of the north, there exists a magical place known as the Mushroom Grove. In this enchanted realm, dwell the adorable Flippets, small green beings who serve as the guardians of the forest's secrets. One day, the Flippets decided to create an intriguing game to test their skills against each other.

This game involved a special formation where all the Flippets stood aligned, except for one who turned away from the others. This small challenge became a fun tradition among the Flippets, known as "Find Me."

The player takes on the role of a fearless Flippet explorer, embarking on an exciting journey to locate the Flippet who chose to turn their back to the group. Do you have the dexterity and keen insight required to find the intrepid Flippet? The Mushroom Grove awaits you, filled with mysteries and unparalleled fun.

name: Out Of Memories
description:
A surreal, minimalist spooky ride through impossible geometry, deadly traps and caustic commentary from the observers of the player's attempt to stay alive for just a little longer, as a toxin kills them little by little.

The game has text graphics and uses the character set from the original PC from 1981. It's presented as if running on that hardware, on a green phosphor monitor - with just a hint of red.

name: Portrait of a Ghost
description: A "spirit photographer" learns that ghosts are far more real than he thought.

name: Flare Nuinui Quest
description: Play as Shiranui Flare in this retro action platformer, wielding her dual pistols, as you explore the world on a quest to save your friends!

name: Owold
description: Owold is a type of Psychological Horror game. A story that emerged after an event that took place years later when humanity completely placed itself in the multiverse.

name: From Hell
description: From Hell is a third-person action survival horror. Explore an ancient manor in the late 1960s, fight ghouls and all kinds of monsters from the mythical underworld. Survive, craft items, solve puzzles and unlock secrets in the hunt for secret of your missing old friend.

name: Under The Blue Horizon: Aquarium
description: "Under the blue horizon - Aquarium" is a game for those who want to enjoy watching fish. Observe fish in the sea and in aquariums. Discover more types of special fish. Enjoy it while working, relax, or clear your mind.

name: Miner Open Chests
description: It's a relaxing miner style game full of fun. You can use various tools to break barriers or jump onto platforms. Find your way through maze-like levels by solving puzzles and operating machineries to find treasure chests. The pixel mode bring you classic 1990s' game experience.

name: Recovery Phrase
description: Uncover hidden words, piece together clues, and think beyond the game screen to unravel mysteries. Every challenge pushes the boundaries of your creativity, demanding you to use both in-game elements and real-world insights. Each step brings you closer to decoding the Recovery Phrase.

name: Tales of The White Knight
description: This is a new SRPG strategy role-playing game created by the WK-Studio. The game will feature beautiful graphics presented in a 3D top-down perspective. Set in the war-torn continent of Breskan, the protagonists will face many trials and tribulations, what will be their fate?

name: Project SJHG
description: The Journey to Restore the Distorted Time and Space

name: Enemy On the Tail!
description: “Enemy on the Tail!” is a turn-based tactical dueling game about aerial combat. Choose your plane, use its unique traits, anticipate enemy moves, and attack! Or shake off enemies with clever maneuvers! Train against AI and compete with friends online. Ready for takeoff?

name: Reality Rifts
description: 3D platformer with a portal gun! Solve puzzles, exciting levels, become a master of portal travel.

name: Blockdock
description: Move, rotate, and place blocks to fill platforms. Play against the clock, be accurate, or just relax with endless play in this Tetris-inspired game.

name: Hover Groove
description: A physics-based platformer about a drone looking for a way. You are hovering above the ground with electric beams. Your goal is to angle the thrusters to overcome increasingly difficult obstacles. The controls are difficult, but mastering them is all the more satisfying!

name: Scotophobia
description: Scotophobia is a psychological horror in which you're your accommodation is rapidly changing ceasing to belong to you. Will you be able to uphold your abode, reveal the origin of the mysterious guests, keep sanity, and… survive?

name: Anna's Summer Splash
description: The peaceful Dolpik Isles are under attack by the notorious Gooble gang. They have stolen the power of the sun metals and the only one that can stop them is Anna, a cheerful inventor who just had her and her brother's vacation ruined!

name: Blob-Y
description: Play as Blob-Y, a sentient blob yearning for freedom. Push the testing facility to its limit as you overcome mind-bending levels. Discover how to combine mechanics in creative ways to outsmart your creators in this challenging puzzle game.

name: Crash Puzzle Hammer-San
description:
A full-fledged action puzzle game with simple controls!
A massive 300 stages!
Includes an edit feature to create your own stages!

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Annals of Pinecany's Mappou Age
description:
Version 2.6 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New character: Rappa
• New area: Penacony Paperfold University College
• New Trailblaze Continuance: Banana Outrage: Battles Without Ninja and Humanity
• …and more!

name: Chroma Cross
description: Chroma Cross takes Nonograms beyond the binary of black and white and brings them into a rainbow of color. Experience Picross in refreshing polychrome.

name: Through The Veil
description: A horror game in which the line between madness and reality is blurred.

name: Earth Daddy
description: Are you ready to join the Plan and help shape Earth's future?

name: Cat Guardian
description: Cat Guardian is a flexible card game blending tower defense and survival. Manage resources, build, and strategize to protect the Tree of Hope from zombies. Can the cats of Meowx Planet succeed in their mission and survive?

name: The Last of the 9 Lives
description: In this fast-paced, infinite jumping adventure, guide your cat as they leap from platform to platform, racing against the rising water that speeds up the longer you survive. Precision and quick reflexes are key as you collect milk and fish for bonus points, all while navigating randomly generated platforms. With its charming pixel art and simple controls, the game offers a challenging yet rewarding experience where every jump counts. A throwback to simpler times. How high can you climb before the water catches up?

name: Cheese: The Cheese Collector
description: Cheese - The Cheese Collector is a grindy clicker game. Compete against friends or the globe to have the most cheese. Unlock upgrades, choose a theme that fits you, View a user's profile and statistics.

name: Idili
description: A first-person Survival Horror video game. Discover Sardinian tradition and experience its terrifying legends as they come to life in your hands. Investigate, explore, escape. You will have to survive with all your strength to uncover its secrets.

name: Journey to Incrementalia
description: Journey to Incrementalia is an incremental auto-battler RPG about a necromancer on a mysterious quest. Cast diabolical spells, summon an army and open the gates of hell on your quest to break down 99 legendary walls on the road to the lost city of Incrementalia.

name: Banana Blitz
description: Banana Blitz is an exclusively online multiplayer running game where players must use their wits and reflexes to outrun, outsmart, and backstab their friends to be the first to reach the finish. Set traps, unleash chaos, and steal the idol at the last second as you battle for supremacy in thrilling, fast-paced races.

name: Terraformers: Megastructures
description: In this Terraformers' DLC you can build a megastructure in every Martian city. Will you construct a self-sufficient Arcology, a facility to completely control a city's local climate zone, or a space elevator to vastly increase your trading capacity?

name: Dark Light
description: Mio is a young girl surrounded by death, and after an unexpected accident, she finds out where people go after they die. Maybe Heaven, or Hell...or an Underworld full of demons and mysteries.

name: Digbeat: Godot Deeper
description: A rhythm digging arcade game. Move to the beat and try to reach new depths!

name: World of Unlit
description: A movement based first person shooter. Your only mission is to destroy all the Statues. Developed by one person MaxyDev also going by just Maxy.

name: Levana Horror Tale
description: You must complete a lunar mission only with the other person on the radio. When you realize that you were not sufficiently informed about the place.

name: Wilmot Works It Out
