description: Wilmot Works It Out is a puzzle building game about completing beautiful images and using them to decorate the walls of your house.

name: VirusRush + Hazard of the Ages
description: Face powerful bosses in a soulslike challenge amidst bullet hell! Each one will test your adaptability, skills, and strategic thinking, as you are fragile and will need to manage your stamina to dodge with your dash amidst intense, fast-paced action! To progress, you don't just need to defeat them but also master the combats to achieve the best rankings and obtain the stars needed to unlock more battles.

name: Zero Factory
description: Embark on a journey from Stone Age to industrial power in Zero Factory, where survival meets automation in a magical, corrupted world. Face bosses, harness artifacts, and build a mechanical empire.

name: The Protagonish
description: An adventure game, where you don't control the adventurer. Play the side characters in a medieval village, and decide to help or hinder the adventurer in their mysterious quest.

name: Sense of Darkness
description: Where am I? Is it a dream? The afterlife? Or just a hallucination? You have a rare chance to experience awakening in this adventure VR game. Are you ready to step into the darkness and discover what lies beyond the veil?

name: Agora Project
description: Agora Project is a first-person horror game, Walking Simulator, inspired by a real serial killer. You play as Mary Williams, an 18-year-old girl who is going to a party with their friends. Little did she know who was driving her to the party.

name: Submergent
description: Explore and navigate an underwater cave in your submarine.

name: Escapism Ltd.
description: This is a pixel-style platformer. Players control Little Blue Hair, who has been tormented by work and finally made up his mind to resign. Using skills such as jumping, dashing, and climbing, he finds a way out and escapes from the maze-like work area.

name: Told God: The Legacy of Cthulhu
description: This is a Cthulhu theme survival adventure game. You can play Vincent, the descendant of the survivors in "The call of Cthulhu", and a mysterious woman of unknown identity, in a island in the South Pacific Ocean, experiencing the thrilling adventure that makes human beings become "originer".

name: Chrono
description: Chrono is a puzzle/platformer game where you control how time affects objects in the world. By freezing time, fast-forwarding, or rewinding objects, you can crack a wide variety of puzzles. The goal is to escape the facility where you are trapped, before time runs out.

name: Ulia Chronicles
description: Ulia Chronicles is a city-building game set in a fantasy universe. Build your city, gather resources, and make your citizens thrive. Overcome the challenges that will arise on your path both on the earthly and spiritual plane.

name: K-Bot
description: K-Bot is an innovative puzzle casual game that cleverly combines classic block stacking and path planning game elements. Players need to strategically move within a dynamically changing play area to achieve the goal of clearing lines.

name: Ban: The Prologue of Gucha Gucha
description: 【A richly coloured horror and mystery tale】"BAN: The Prologue of GUCHA GUCHA” is a third-person horror adventure game. Experience the messy horror from the perspective of the protagonist, who is caught up in the whirlwind of events in a certain town in Japan, Utagacho.

name: Apples Busy Day
description: Apples Busy Day is a short and cozy game about exploring and helping your silly neighbors. Come check out all Apple has to do on the island of fruit!

name: Lil' Airport
description: Lil' Airport is a an idle airport management game. Build and manage your own airport directly on your desktop. Expand your airport from a small airstrip to a bustling travel hub. Schedule flights, delight passengers with amenities, face emergencies - or just watch the planes go by.

name: Winch it Out
description: Tired of the same old Two-Button Gas-and-Go car games? This one's for you!

name: Spaceborne Survivors
description: Slice, dice and blow up thousands of enemy ships! Spaceborne Survivors is a sci-fi casual game with rogue-lite elements, where your choices can allow you to become a mecha menace against huge enemy fleets invading your space system.

name: Stardust Demon
description:
Stardust Demon is a retro metroidvania adventure about exploring alien planets. It features a mixture of challenges, from platforming to fighting to solving puzzles. Power up with an array of abilities and many hidden upgrades and secrets.

Experience the story featuring quirky demons and aliens. And many hidden rooms await in the depths of the planets to test your skill and knowledge of Algol's powers.

name: Technotopia
description: Technotopia is a city-builder roguelike card game. Take on the role of an AI designed to build a perfect city. Build districts, meet the needs of diverse communities and maintain the delicate balance between factions vying for control over you!

name: Circus Elephant
description: Circus Elephant is a 3d platformer, where you play as an elephant in a circus. You need to control a ball that the elephant rides

name: Ash & Adam's Gobsmacked
description: You are a goblin in this mini-FPS roguelite. Fight your way through The Arenas where you wreck junkbots to thrill the goblin crowds.

name: The Nightwatch
description: Fight your way through hordes of monsters in this highly customisable 2D survival roguelite. Explore, unearth and make the most out of the upgrades, talent trees and items available to push through the attack. What will you find in the dark floors of the wizard tower, and will you save the night ?

name: Fight To The Death
description: Join an arena filled with hundreds or thousands of monsters, use each character's unique skills, collect powerful items, create your own play style and become the last man standing.

name: Age of History 3
description: Grand strategy wargame where the destiny of Civilizations rests in your hands - will they stand united under your leadership or fall divided in conflict? Journey through the entire saga of human civilization, from its earliest days to the futuristic era, crafting your legacy age by age.

name: Fatal Midnight
description:
At night, when the earth had already settled into darkness, Dan woke up from unusual sounds coming from the depths of the house. Concerned about his sister, he decides to check on her. Entering her room, he discovers that she has disappeared. Fear confronts him, and he begins to rush around the house in search of her.

Can you find your sister and help her?

name: Dexterous: Time to Steal
description: A Match-3 Roguelite where you build your deck of blocks, collect game-changing relics, and battle your way through crime bosses in an attempt to pay off your debt and escape the time loop.

name: Survivors of Mayhem
description: Survivors of Mayhem - a fast paced fantasy survivor game. Embark on a heart-pounding journey through waves of fantasy battle, where chaos reigns, and your every decision could mean the difference between life and death. You'll face relentless waves of enemies, upgrade your character, pick and choose from over two dozen of abilities, a hundred items, and stat upgrades to try to survive.

name: Wipe Girls
description: Players will play as a bounty hunter and live and work in the city of dreams. Because of a chance commission, unveiled his revenge journey. This game has a total of four female characters on the scene.In addition to their apparent identities, there are other secrets hidden behind them.

name: The Scourge
description: The Scourge game tells stories revolving around urban legends from the 1990s in Saigon, Vietnam. The male protagonist is trapped by past sins caused by his and his family's mistakes. Now, he must confront and overcome the consequences to find a path to redemption, and you are him.

name: Cursed Deal
description: Cursed Deal is a Co-Op horror game like nothing you've ever experienced before. The game focuses on a dark vampire cult and features a villain who becomes cursed by betraying his cult on the night of the ritual and turns into a dark creature. The player who made a deal with the devil to get rid of the curse, must hunt down cult members and curse them into his side. Meanwhile, the cultists must complete the ritual and gain vampire powers on this challenging night. But beware! When humans turn into vampires, the roles will change and the creature hunt will begin. You never know who will win in this game where teams and roles will change, where the hunter can be the prey and the prey can be the hunter. Hide in the dark, use your special powers, and survive. Most importantly, don't trust anyone. If your friend is cursed, he will turn into a creature and come after you.

name: Asteroid Colony
description: In this real time strategy city builder game you will help humanity reaching beyond earth by establishing a permanent and thriving settlement in the asteroid belt. Settling in space comes with enormous challenges and dangers, which you will have to guide your people through

name: BioFusion
description: BioFusion is a co-op multiplayer, PvE, first-person-shooter, tower defense game. Swing on a grappling hook, ride a hovercraft, throw grenades, collect buffs, build towers and traps. Do what you must to keep the mutants from the Spores of Evolution.

name: Return Alive
description: Return Alive is a Free-to-Play Top-down Tactical Shooter Game.

name: Champions Tactics: Grimoria Chronicles
description:
Champions Tactics Grimoria Chronicles is a brand new PVP Tactical RPG experimental game on PC published by Ubisoft utilizing Oasys Blockchain and NFT elements. Assemble a team of mythical Champions, engage in thrilling tactical battles against other players and discover the legends of the dark and mystical world of Grimoria.

Are you ready to write your name in the chronicles?
Follow us on our social networks and subscribe to our newsletter to stay in touch with the latest news.

name: The World of Kung Fu: Dragon and Eagle
description: A nostalgic pixel RPG that tells a Wuxia fantasy set in ancient China. You will start as a no-name wayfarer in a world of Kungfu, acquaint yourself with journeymen from feuding clans and sects, learn different schools of martial arts, and eventually make your own name at the crossroads of times.

name: Little Ghosthunter
description: Uncover the stories behind a family of ghosts to free them from the confines of their own house, as you search for a way to summon your best friend from the afterlife.

name: Rivals of Aether II
description: Rivals of Aether II is the sequel to the hit indie fighting game, Rivals of Aether. Play as both new and returning elemental fighters in the next generation of platform fighters.

name: Daemon Masquerade
description: An anime-inspired supernatural detective game. Uncover the identities and powers of your adversaries using a conspiracy board full of evidence.

name: While We Wait Here
description:
Share thoughts and hot food with your last ever clients, as you wait for the world to end.

Tackling themes of time, the armageddon and the intricacies of human psychology, While We Wait Here promises to be as deep as it does captivating, as players must juggle between the mundanity of flipping burger patties and pouring soda to the frighteningly serious threat that lies outside the diner’s doors.

name: Creatures of War
description: Embark on a survival horror saga set in a treacherous world ruled by primal terrors. Scour for invaluable treasures, fortify your arsenal to combat evolving threats, and unravel the chilling mystery shrouding Delta squad's fate. Can you survive amidst the lurking jaws of the ancient predators?

name: The Hungry Fly
description: Once upon a time, there was a fly. A hungry fly. A fly with razor-sharp teeth, with a taste for dead things. This is the tale of its adventure to find something dead to devour, in a swamp where nothing dies, everything is grotesque, and every choice matters, no matter how surreal.

name: Galactic Thunderdome
description: Galactic Thunderdome is a 2D sci-fi platform brawler with a focus on physics-based mayhem. Best your friends with a vast array of weapons and gadgets in a world rich with emergent gameplay, explosive antics, and bloody remains.

name: Zero Sievert
description: Zero Sievert is a tense top-down shooter that challenges you to scavenge a procedurally-generated wasteland, loot gear, and explore what’s left of a devastated world. When the odds are stacked against you, you’ll need to do more than just survive...

name: Feudal Baron: King's Land
description: The King has granted you the right to rule over a part of his kingdom. Feudal Baron: King's Land is a strategy game in which you build, develop and govern a medieval city, take care of its citizens and defend it against the enemies of the realm.

name: Wild Planet
description: Unwind and enjoy the life in Wild planet ; a relaxing adventure full of discoveries and quests! You're shipwrecked on a mysterious planet with your crew. Build your own camp, hunt, craft and discover the story behind those mysterious lands. All while the environment changes around you.

name: Best Sellers Complete Bundle
description: In this Bundle, you'll find our studio's Best Sellers for Xbox and Windows, including Mr. T-Shirt, with adventures in a paper world; Little Bear, featuring a bear cub on a quest for honey; Slime Ranger, a strategic quest to defeat the Slime King; and Sunbeam Feast, a challenging precision platformer.

name: Modern and Retro Bundle
description: In this Bundle, you'll find modern and retro games from our studio for Xbox and Windows, including Dark Elven Legacy, where Elynar embarks on a sacred quest for ancient relics; Ducky Dash, a nostalgic tribute to retro portable games; Sunbeam Feast, a challenging precision platformer; and Mr. T-Shirt, a whimsical adventure in a paper world.

name: Alpacas X Cats Bundle
description: Alpacapaca Dash + Cats With Guns

name: Sonic 3 & Tenna
description:
Eggman's off on vacation, Ring Racing, so Tenna came out of Eggman's TV and took everything while he was gone.

Blast through Sonic 3 with a Deltarune twist! With over 18 completely new bosses to fight, 6 new gameplay gimmicks to endure, and a modified story, Sonic 3 & Tenna completely transforms the game into a new, yet familiar experience! Not a Undertale, Deltarune or UTDR fan-content fan? That's okay! The bosses have been designed with Sonic gameplay philosophy in mind, and the entire experience itself is stand-out enough to not require any prior UTDR knowledge.

name: Tell Me Your Story: Complete +
description: Sin descripción

name: Uzzuzzu My Pet: Golf Dash - Superb Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Pocket: Atari Edition
description: The Super Pocket Atari Edition is a handheld gaming console that brings the golden era of video gaming right to your pocket. With 50 classic games from the legendary company, including, Asteroids, Missile Command, Berzerk, Crystal Castles along with games from the 2600, 5200, 7800 and the Atari Lynx!

name: Sea Town: Fish Market Simulator
description: Build your fishing empire in Sea Town - Fish Market Simulator! Explore oceans, upgrade boats, and conquer a dynamic market across unique islands. Ready to rule the seas? Start now!

name: Office 29
description: In Office 29, a seemingly normal workday turns into a nightmarish journey through a haunted office. You wake up at night, alone, and must gather your belongings while navigating terrifying anomalies that distort reality. As you explore, strange events unfold—lights flicker, shadows move, and eerie figures lurk outside the window. Each anomaly hides secrets, pushing you deeper into the unknown.

name: Bing in Wonderland: Wings & Weapon Looks - Purgatory
description: This DLC includes: 1 new gorgeous appearance for each weapon, for a total of 5 weapon appearances for 5 different weapons. A pair of wings with a matching theme to the weapon appearance. While using the wings, holding the spacebar in mid-air allows for a slow descent. Equip at the weapon NPC.

name: Trainz 2019: B08 Baggage Car
description: Build by INKA (An Indonesian Train Industries Company) on 2008. This car is running on the Java island of Indonesia. Some of this "Cargo" cars are coupled with the Passenger train service. This content has Animated doors and custom product.

name: The Shattered Veil
description: Sin descripción

name: Tell Me Your Story: Porcelain Puzzle 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Tell Me Your Story: Porcelain Puzzle 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Tell Me Your Story: Ancient Puzzle
description: Sin descripción

name: Wildermyth: Off-hand Item Skin Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Minesweeper & Dungeon RPG
description: "Minesweeper & Dungeon RPG" is an RPG game that combines minesweeping and rogue-like gameplay. Players explore the game world using classic minesweeper mechanics, collecting coins and treasure chests. By building up their skills, equipment, and items, players enhance their power to face the challenges of different world regions and unique enemies, ultimately completing the final adventure.

name: Fall Guys: PlayStation Plus Autumn Pack
description:
Fall into autumn with these cosy seasonal wears!

Includes:

Pumpkin Spice (Whole Costume)
Autumn Leaves Pack (Upper)
Tawny (Colour)
Infatuated (Pattern)
Bean to Cup (Nameplate)
Espresso (Faceplate)
3000 Kudos

name: Evil Dungeons 2
description: This is a first person shooter dungeon-master-like style, for the 40th anniversary of the Thomson MO5 computer. The game is in French only, but you don't really need to speak French in order to play it.

name: Undead Vendetta
description: Step into the shadowy world of Rosewood City, where your ordinary life as a waitress is about to morph into a tantalizing quest to break an ancient curse.

name: Super Pocket: Technōs Edition
description:
The Super Pocket is a series of handheld game console.

The Technōs Edition contains the following games:

- Block Out
- Crash 'n' the Boys: Street Challenge (NES)
- The Combatribes
- Double Dragon
- Double Dragon (GB)
- Double Dragon (NES)
- Double Dragon II: The Revenge
- Double Dragon 3: The Rosetta Stone
- Minky Monkey
- Mysterious Stones: Dr John's Adventure
- Renegade
- River City Ransom (NES)
- Super Dodge Ball
- Super Double Dragon (SNES)
- Super Spike V'Ball (NES)

name: Bikmin 269 DX: Director's Cut
description: Bikmin 269 DX: Director's Cut is a full game mod of Pikmin 2 with a brand new story, and new areas! Yes, every area is new and fully modeled! This isn't just a "repaint" of Pikmin 2, it contains an entire new story with new characters from a parallel Pikmin universe where many things are strange, a little bit memey, or just not correct. With over 130 new treasures to collect and brand new mechanics to make the game feel fresh this mod is essentially a new game. This mod is not meant to be taken too seriously in most aspects, but its gameplay is meant to be fresh and creative for fans of the Pikmin series to enjoy even if they don't care about the memes.

name: EBaseball MLB Pro Spirit
description: A baseball mobile app game by Konami it has monthly game modes that shifts every month

name: Spellchanted 2D Hidden Object Puzzle Adveture Tile-Matching
description: Enter a magical world filled with legendary Fairy Tale characters. Become the greatest wizard. Help a young witch break an evil curse and save the Fairy Tale kingdoms!

name: Escape Simulator: The Talos Principle DLC
description: In this DLC, players will face a series of intricate puzzles and challenges inspired by The Talos Principle universe. Whether you are a veteran of Escape Simulator or a fan of The Talos Principle, we believe this room will offer a unique, engaging experience that bridges the gap between these two beloved puzzle game worlds.

name: Path to Nowhere: Glitchwave Nihil
Pac-Man SuperFast!
description: Pac-Man SuperFast! is a remake of the original Pac-Man for YouTube Playables.

name: VinylMinty's Video Game Quiz
description: From sound effects and places to textual questions, multiple choice, naming characters based on images or voices, and many, many more, dive in with a deep mix of game tests besides music. Bring all that you love about gaming into one truly immersive experience, and it's interactive with Twitch chat to let your audience join in and help-or challenge-you along the way.

name: 0101: Counter Bonus Levels 2
description: This DLC includes another 10 bonus Counter levels, extremely cool, which will make you love the game even more.

name: Sleeping Beauty: The Kingdom of Lost Dreams
description: Queen Aurora has known many years of peace in her kingdom, but everything has to change when strange nightmares affect the inhabitants of the place.

name: The Carnival Killer
description: Step right up to the most twisted carnival you'll ever encounter! In The Carnival Killer, 4 players find themselves trapped in a nightmarish amusement park where laughter turns to terror. Killer Clowns stalk the grounds, hunting down anyone who fails to escape the nightmare.

name: Smoking Gun
description: Smoking Gun is a single player, western themed, vertical scroller, shoot 'em up arcade game. Step into the boots of an Arizona Ranger and fight for justice as ruthless bandits descend upon Hickstown, convinced the lawmen are behind their gang's mysterious disappearances.

name: Gunz & Golf
description: Gunz & Golf is a single-player, physics-based precision platformer. Master 3 unique guns, blast your ball through outlandish obstacles, and conquer a handcrafted pixel art course by the omnipresent Developer. Prepare for hilarious frustration and satisfying triumphs!

name: Chores in the Night
description: "I want this apartment spotless!" shouts your mom before going to her night shift. Use your cleaning supplies and courage to have the house cleaned before your mom comes back. A first person short story about doing chores and avoiding evil forces to survive the night.

name: Desert Mercenary Corps
description: Welcome to Desert Mercenaries, a role-playing adventure game set in the desert. In the vast and barren Monchi Desert, you will form your own team and explore the unknown desert mysteries. Let your team win the respect and recognition of the entire Monchi Desert.

name: Auto_Battler_RPG
description: This is a game about automatical upgrades and unlocking of resources The game plays by itself while all you do is upgrade your hero... and attempt to move even further in the dungeon and by doing that growing in strength.

name: BoringFly
description: A turn based casual card game with a storyline that only requires the use of a mouse throughout the game. On the basis of simulating the gameplay of Lianliankan, add combat elements. At the same time, players can choose different talents and adapt to different gameplay expressions.

name: Pogo Knight
description: Bounce your way to the top and claim victory... How hard could it be?

name: Blood=Bullets
description: Blood=Bullets is a bullet hell boss rush action platformer where you dash into bullets to refill ammo. In order to kill the blood itself, one must hack into the sequence.

name: HexaTerra
description: Dynamically change the landscape in this hexagon block puzzle game. Strategize to solve complex puzzles with biomes that shift depending on adjacent tiles. Complete the story or play endless levels.

name: Back to the Rooms
description: Back to the Rooms is a 6-player co-op horror experience. Survive and explore the backrooms with your friends or alone to save your home.

name: Deep Despair 3
description: Deep Despair 3 is an open-world survival action-adventure with RPG elements! Fight, survive, dig, build, explore vast worlds, engage in farming, breed animals, gather resources, and level up to the max!

name: 8alloween
description: Walking Simulator Inspired by the 8th exit, this game requires sound for identifying anomalies. Use speakers or headphones. Contains mild horror elements.

name: New Journey to the West
description: "New Journey to the West" is a multiplayer RPG. Form a four-player team to defeat demons, explore poetic landscapes, and enjoy scenic beauty. The revolutionary aerial combat system allows you to enjoy smooth and graceful battles. Join this with friends!

name: Doomsday Cleaner
description: In the game, you will play as a survivor, facing endless zombie threats. You need to use your weapons and intelligence to clean up every zombie, protect yourself, and find hope for survival.

name: Nowv
description: This game is inspired by Ningning, a member of the South Korean idol group aespa. It conveys the message that even one's flaws can become strengths through inner growth.

name: Extreme Offroad Racing
description: Extreme Offroad Racing is a FREE all-terrain, off-road monster truck racing game featuring hundreds of race challenges. Get behind the wheel and buckle up for the most addictive and FUN physics-based driving experience!

name: Formless Mother
description: Formless Mother is set of 5 MBF21 maps set in a dark, very red, atmosphere heavily inspired by the work of Suguru Tanaka.

name: Circle Triangle Cross
description: Sin descripción

name: Mouselash
description: Mouselash is an action roguelite where you are the mouse cursor. Create your build by combining weapons and stats as you satisfyingly pop waves of enemies!

name: Hidden Objects
description: Immerse yourself in the world of hidden object search! In this exciting game you will find many unique locations hand-drawn by the artist. The game will give you positive emotions.

name: Hero Rescue
description: Do you like rescue games?

name: Hatch Tales: A Heroic Hookshot Adventure
description:
Hookshot your way through a unique platforming adventure
Embark on an action-packed platforming quest across the mystical lands of Talonreach. Join Hatch, a flightless hawk mountaineer equipped with a powerful hookshot, on a perilous journey to confront the evil Nazar, and save the kingdom from his icy grip.

The many tales of Hatch's saga will take him from the comfort of his homeland to the far, untamed edges of the kingdom. Encountering powerful foes and dangerous hazards. Unlocking amazing abilities and experiencing wonders never before dreamed of. Whether these tales end in triumph, or become cautionary, rests on the shoulders of our young hero.

name: The Ghost of Redstone Manor
description: A first-person mystery game with puzzles and story-rich dialogue. Explore a 3D environment with original art, character design, and a distinct cartoon-y style. Investigate your own murder through branching conversations and a unique possession mechanic. Featuring original music by Svetlana Rudenko.

name: Terrorbytes
description: 4-player co-op: Share resources in this TRON & Stranger Things inspired horror that focuses on team work mechanics. You and your friends are sucked into an arcade machine, and forced to gather pellets for a horrifically mangled retro-arcade hero.

name: Benchmark
description: This game is a stress-relief title designed specifically for relaxation.

name: Manual
description: This game centers around a colorfully randomized ball which players must navigate along a winding path.

name: Abolish
description: This is a delightful pixel-style adventure game set in a world of yellow land and blue sky, where you embark on an adventure as a Corgi puppy.

name: Phantom
description: This game features a vivid cartoon style with a piglet wielding a gun as the protagonist.

name: October Panic
description: An arcade-style platformer with five levels and no saving/loading. A small trick-or-treat bag packed to the brim with both treats and tricks.

name: Cosmic Call
description: Cosmic Call is a brutal 3D FPS Roguelike Boomer shooter set inside the prison of the Great One. Fight your way out of this hellish nightmare, collecting otherworldly weapons and horrifying items along the way.

name: Portrait of a Cornish Woman
description: Portrait of a Cornish Woman is a Victorian Romance Visual Novel of Manners, capturing the subtle, yet powerful emotions of two women as they fight for their place in each other's lives while living under a veil of discretion.

name: I'm on Observation Duty 7
description: The seventh installment of this beloved franchise presents you with six new levels, unique anomalies and insane intruders. As an employee of a mysterious organization your job is to monitor live surveillance camera footage and spot anomalies. Report any changes in the monitored rooms by clicking on the anomaly and selecting the type OR by choosing the right location and type of the anomaly from a menu to fix it. Anomalies appear at random so you never knows what is going to happen next. Too many active and unreported anomalies means death. Goal is to survive the entire night (from 00:00 to 06:00 in game time). You will need sharp eyes and good memory. The game contains psychological horror that mainly comes from making you paranoid about what has changed.

name: Alfred is a Bad Guy
description: Alfred is a Bad Guy is a multiplayer board game that combines dice duelling, lying and investigation. Each player has a secret role and a different objective in the game. Bring out your dice and your lying skills to win in ALFRED is a BAD GUY!

name: Minecraft: Bundles of Bravery
description: Minecraft: Bundles of Bravery adds bundles, as well as Hardcore mode for Bedrock Edition. It was announced at Minecraft Live 2024.

name: Minecraft: Bundles of Bravery
description: Minecraft: Bundles of Bravery adds bundles, as well as Hardcore mode for Java Edition Realms. It was announced at Minecraft Live 2024.

name: Dexter The Hamster
description: Help Dexter chomp and shoot his way out of the deceptively oppressive Happy Hamster Farms in 6 personality packed platforming levels.

name: Storage Guys
description: Team up with friends and run your own storage! Receive, store and ship items to make a profit. Handle everything from boxes to hazardous goods. Design and expand your warehouse, manage costs, power and staff. Make deals with smugglers at night, just keep it hidden from inspection.

name: The Pane Puzzle
description: Layer and match colored tiles to restore pictures in The Pane Puzzle. Simple at first, but it gets tricky as you progress!

name: 8-man Iriguchi
description: Trapped in a shrine, you must navigate by following rules: proceed unless anomalies occur, turn back if anomalies are found, and reach Hachiman. This walking simulator, inspired by exits like "8 Hachiman," includes sound-based anomalies and mild horror elements. Playtime: 20-60 minutes.

name: Dead Island 2: Neighborhood Watch
description: Patch 6 will introduce all Dead Island 2 players to the Neighborhood Watch game mode, a new cooperative horde mode, in which players will have to work together against swarms of zombies, including a new way to strategize against the undead.

name: Fantasy Friends: Dream Worlds
description: Come and play with Aurea in Fantasy Friends: Dream Worlds, an ultra-cute puzzle and platform game. Enter this wonderful place and make lots of fantastic friends!

name: Lynked: Banner of the Spark
description: Team-up, brawl and build in this co-op action game that blends hack and slash combat with roguelite-inspired missions and town-building progression that goes beyond the run! Unlock and upgrade gear, rescue robot allies, and lead the resistance against the world-dominating Combots!

name: Kong: Survivor Instinct
description: When giant monsters fight, no one’s safe. Embark on a thrilling quest of survival in a city that’s become a battleground for Titans. Use the lethal strength of Kong and other monsters to your own advantage in this official Monsterverse game set shortly after the events of Godzilla vs. Kong.

name: ArkCraft: The Rebirth of the World
description: In this open-world crafting and building game, you explore an ancient world full of dangers and secrets. Collect animals and plants, build bases and master the craft as you build your ark and save civilization from destruction by the flood and then rebuild it.

name: Choice Matters
description: A resource management card game where every decision impacts your journey. Navigate diverse events, balance resources, and uncover unique stories.

name: Casino Island Simulator
description: Run your own casino. Buy new gambling games, take payments, hire employees, expand and design your casino. Slots, blackjack, roulette, poker, baccarat, craps and more...

name: Sonic x Shadow Generations: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
The digital deluxe edition allows access to the game 3 days earlier, it also Includes:
-The Base Game + Digital Deluxe Season Pass:
-- An additional character skin and level for Shadow (releasing Holiday 2024)
-- Terios Skin
-- Extra BGM Pack
-- Digital Art Book + Soundtrack
-- Skill Points (Sonic Generations)

name: Oryks
description: 2D platform game inspired by the Halloween atmosphere like in Tim Burton's films. In the game, we conduct conversations, solve investigations, move left and right, jump and shoot to defeat enemies, we also interact with the environment. We also make decisions that affect the course of the mission.

name: Veil Runners
description: Veil Runners is an action roguelite arena auto-shooter where you fight through waves of creatures to reach the next planet in search of the source. Level up, loot, buy randomly generated items and more to upgrade your character and units into an awesome and game-breaking build.

name: The Art Collector
description: You're an artist tasked with taking over an art gallery in order to help your mentor. Customize your gallery and home, befriend local artists while you get them the exposure they need, and master the fine art of selling fine art in this narrative-driven, capitalism-management, shopkeeper, RPG, Sim.

name: Realpolitiks 3: Earth and Beyond
description: Prove your political brilliance in a grand strategy like no other: pick any contemporary country, set up your government and navigate the pitfalls of domestic and international politics. A glorious destiny awaits - the domination of not just the Earth, but the whole Solar system!

name: Jump Fall
description: Dive into Jump Fall, a thrilling 3D platformer where you master obstacles and puzzles using Jump 'n' Run skills and unique mechanics. The first level features a grappling hook to navigate tough terrains and avoid falls. Progress through checkpoints and save manually to resume your adventure anytime.

name: Dungeon Tiny Hunter
description: In "Dungeon and Little Monster Hunters", you can create your own dungeon adventure, travel through a dungeon kingdom full of demons, constantly overcome obstacles and eliminate monsters, and invite partners from the monster hunting camp to join you. The whole game is a rich action-mowing 2D game.

name: Vyanka's Memories
description: Vyanka's Memories is a platform-style game with metroidvania elements. Vyanka is a monster hunter who was called to her home village to protect it from a vampire. In the confrontation, she loses all her memories and powers and must remember them by defeating monsters in different biomes.

name: Koi Land
description: "Koi Land" is a highly relaxing idle game. Purchase various types of koi fry, raise them over time, and sell them to earn money! Unlock multiple varieties of koi, listen to soothing music, and enjoy the sight of colorful koi as they accompany you through pleasant times!

name: BeatRider
description: Mioi and the others, as apprentice Tuners, embarked on a six-month investigation in Baixiang City. As their mission progressed, the city's normalcy began to unravel, with dissonance and disturbances growing increasingly frequent and severe.

name: Sequence
description: Sequence is a dice-based poker game, multiplayer & competitive, inspired by the classics Generala/Yahtzee/Yacht/Yatzy (every area of the world has a name for the game!). Now, players from all over the world can compete to climb the ranks - will you become a Senior Master?

name: Clony
description: This is a 2D puzzle game with gravity. You can create a clone above your own head, and if you can press all the yellow buttons at the same time, you will clear the puzzle. Test your own puzzle skills while relaxing.

name: Bike Stunt 3D Freestyle
description: Carefully move 3d motorcycle stunt games for offroad driving tracks in this motorcycle stunt game 2023 is completely different from other bike games 2022 so you can easily perform unlimited 3d offroad stunts.

name: Chained Runes
description: Plan your chain of runes as well as possible, analyze your opponents, and build up an optimized deck to reach King Gormnoq.

name: Arisen Force: HeroTest
description: Join the exquisite pixel world of "HeroTest," team up with heroes across time and space, and engage in thrilling battles against the 「Void」!

name: Fool's Gambit
description: A rogue-like turn-based card strategy game where you have to play and beat an unknown opponent in a game of Blackjack with tarot cards.

name: Escape from the Cannibal Family
description: Never get caught! Jack up the doll's vision! Feel their presence!

name: Potionomics: Masterwork Edition
description:
Assume the role of a penniless witch named Sylvia who must transform her debt-ridden potion shop into a thriving business.

Potionomics: Masterwork Edition will offer new features, including voice-overs, Endless Mode, “Cozy” and “Capitalism” difficulty levels, and additional languages.

name: Batman: Arkham Shadow
description:
Gotham City is in danger. And you’re the only one who can save it.

Prepare to enter Gotham for a new story set in the Batman: Arkham franchise.

name: Slime Farm
description: Dive into Slime Farm Simulator, where you'll play with, and care for the Cutest magical slimes ever seen! Watch as they Evolve in whimsical ways, strategically manage their Elements and moods, and expand your enchantingly cute slime farm.

name: The Fallen Kingdoms
description: A brand-new board game that combines turn-based strategy and card-drafting mechanics to provide an enjoyable experience with friends! Build your kingdom, defeat your rivals, and seize the throne!

name: Frogbound: The Legend of Sir Hopper
description: Frogbound: the Legend of Sir Hopper is a 2d pixel art platformer adventure where you will play as an intrepid amphibian hero! Discover the mystery of the hallowed relics, ancient and powerful artifacts, without succumbing to the perils of your treacherous quest.

name: The Slime's Choice: TSC
description: Slim's Choice is a pure game of chopping monsters, upgrading and exploding equipment! You are an adventure game where slime picks up weapons and attacks the boss!

name: Whispers in the Shadows
description: A Horror game, where you use your torch to fend off the monsters created in your own head, and discover the secrets hidden within the forest.

name: Mycelium
description: Mycelium is a mind-boggling turn-based RPG game with action elements, set inside an ancient infamous cave system with the same name. It tells a story about a diverse cast of characters exploring their inner selves and the cave.

name: Deck of Darkness: Infernal Depths
description: You are an artifact hunter, a seeker and purveyor of rare, magical relics. The ultimate goal of your search is the fabled Deck of Darkness, an incredibly potent arcane artifact said to grant it's bearer immortality... for a price. Journey into the Infernal Depths and face your terrifying destiny.

name: Epic Zombies
description: Epic Zombies - This Game is in Early Access, The Story and Structure are still in Development. You are the last remaining Human on Earth. Can You Survive?

name: Quadricolor: Ultra Sentai Color Ranger
description: Put on your sentai hero suit and join the chromatic battle! Protect the color balance in this lightning-fast 2D arena shooter. Snack it on with friends on a couch or online up to 4 players. Fight against evil forces and rise through the ranks in Quadricolor: Ultra Sentai Color Rangers.

name: Bump in the Night
description: Bump in the Night is a single player game where strategy meets psychological horror. Confined to one room, you'll use cameras and a whiteboard to direct NPCs and collect evidence. Each environment offers unique challenges and frights.

name: Planet Scanner
description: Scan the stars and claim planets for your corporate masters! In Planet Scanner, you will discover unique new worlds, decode transmissions, and upload data all in the name of keeping your job. But what happens if you gaze too long in the void?

name: Alan Wake II: The Lake House
description: Dive into a harrowing survival horror experience with the latest expansion for Alan Wake 2, set in an eerie new location on the shores of Cauldron Lake. Within the Federal Bureau of Control's research station, the Lake House, a catastrophic event has occurred, where reckless experiments have caused reality to collide with the Dark Place.

name: Sunset Humanity
description:
Help a rogue A.I bring about the end of humanity.
Just another routine test, or at least that was the plan...

name: Amanda the Adventurer 2
description: In Amanda the Adventurer 2, the story continues as Riley encounters a mysterious masked figure after destroying the TV in the attic. Travel to the Kensdale Public Library and dig deeper into the mystery of Amanda the Adventurer.

name: Claws & Chaos
description: Claws & Chaos is an auto-chess-style battler featuring charming creatures in dire circumstances. Build your team and hone your skills while battling across both story and competitive PvP modes. Will you earn your place on the Ark?

name: Holiday Party: Mascot Brawl
description: A silly multiplayer party game, Holiday Party: Mascot Brawl brings festive cheer with battles and mini-games matched with absurd weapons. Compete against friends and roast them with a flamethrower and slap them with a GIANT FISH. Jump into this hilarious holiday-themed brawling mayhem today!

name: Virballs
description: Six outlandish planets are overrun with Virballs - viral elemental creatures that consume each other to create exotic hybrids. Clean up this ecological disaster using Virball hybrids as devastating weapons!

name: Evil Awaits
description: Uncover the mystery of Archdale Castle when a sudden explosion exposes a new epidemic.

name: The Axis Unseen
description: The Axis Unseen is a heavy metal horror game created by one of the developers of Skyrim, Starfield and Fallout. Hunt nightmarish monsters from ancient folklore in a mysterious open world, collecting their enhanced sense powers and discovering elemental arrows.

name: Vladimere's Lhore
description: A collection of games by Vladimere Lhore.

name: Raccoon Roller
description: A sidescrolling physics platformer that challenges your creative thinking and mechanical skill. Using rockets and grapples find the fastest way through levels to climb ranks on the leaderboard.

name: Barricade
description: Barricade is a zombie horde shooter with a classic 90's feel. Players use objects to build a barricade that protects their only source of upgrades. Endless waves of zombies will exploit weaknesses in your defenses. Will you juggle building, shooting, and repairing, or be overrun?

name: Fear the Spotlight
description: Fear the Spotlight is an atmospheric third-person horror adventure with a disturbing mystery to unravel. Sneak into school after hours with Vivian and Amy, survive a séance gone wrong, solve tactile puzzles, and, whatever you do, stay out of the spotlight…
